Besides my 9 to 5 job, I teach bible study on a regular basis and I love the note taking features and varied bible apps.  I am also over a youth group, and an administrator at my local church.  My Samsung tablet allows me to communicate with multiple groups on multipe projects and stay organized and current.  And now that I've started working out, I love my playlist of workout songs I have on my tablet.  When I go on a weekend drive to new places my tablet and the mobile hot spot I purchased keep me on target.  And sometimes I even chill and surf online, or play a game.  And I always have opportunities to take great pictures as my tablet is always with me. I gave my 7 in Galaxy tab to my wife.  My daughter purchased the 10 in Galaxy tab for herself.  If you are wondering if you should spend the money for this tablet, Yes, it is worth it.  The only reason I didnt give it all 5 stars was because it came without the 4g built in.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet!
Reviews.Author: Alan L.
Reviews.Content: I love my Galaxy Note 10.1.  It is very fast and powerful.  It comes with several apps to get me started, and so many available from Amazon and the Play Store.  It connected with Amazon without incident and I was able to access my favorite apps I had purchased from Amazon for use on my Kindle Fire.  A great tablet that I know I'm going to have lots of fun with.

Reviews.Title: Love, love, LOVE IT!!!
Reviews.Author: A. Murray
Reviews.Content: I'm not sure what how I ever made it without this.  I've wanted a tablet since the first iPad came out (and I was a hard-core Mac lover), but I could never justify spending that much money on a iPad when I had a iPhone, iPods, Macbook Pro...wanted it, but didn't need it.Then the iPhone 5 came along... I did some serious research before upgrading my phone and ended up with the Galaxy Note 2 - it just blew the iPhone away.  That was the beginning of my love affair with the S-Note and other handwriting apps.  Then I saw the Note 10.1 and fell in love all over again.  It's amazing.  I have never been so organized in my life.  I still love Apple, not crazy about the Android platform yet (not enough control over the permissions for the apps), but I ADORE this device.

Reviews.Title: Enjoying this tablet
Reviews.Author: T. Laster
Reviews.Content: My first tablet, and very happy with my choice. OS is a cross between phone and pc, so it takes some getting used to. Not as smooth or fast as a good laptop, but has alot of capability,  I use if for work, to take notes (pen works great) and organize my files. Exceeded my expectations and the price was right!

Reviews.Title: Best tablet ever
Reviews.Author: stay away
Reviews.Content: The samsung galaxy note 10.1 is awesome for everything especially school. i also love it for it awesome features. if you are debating between tablets and this is one of them, i think that this would be the winner for shure.

Reviews.Title: I really enjoy it
Reviews.Author: Hector R. Espinal "HeScooby"
Reviews.Content: This tab is wonderful. It last about three days on a single charge and does just about everything my laptop does. In fact I hardly use my laptop except for work. There are so many applications that are available via Android that its hard to decide what to install. Most of the applications are free on Google play, but use caution when downloading and doing so since it will eventually fill up you internal storage capacity. I did purchased an additional 64 sd card for it and it stores so much more now.I strongly recommend the additional 64 Gig memory module, unless your going to get the ATIV which is a whole different concept. Since that has a windows 8 operating system and its not Android. I also recommend that you buy an additional power supply so that you can have a spare is case you misplace or damage the one it comes with also you will need an attachment for reading an external USB device. It does read flash drives with the attachment but it wont read my External Passport 2 Terabyte HDD. I am considering buying a Seagate Bluetooth 1 terabyte HDD since it will detect Bluetooth and not need any USB cord to connect it to the my tab device.I do like the slick lines and design that this Tab has. Its easy to use and hold. I don't think you will be disapointed with it I am so happy with mine and have nothing but good things to say about it.Hope this review helps you on deciding on purchasing this tab.

Reviews.Title: A very for tablet for every one
Reviews.Author: Mahendra Acharya
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tabet for my on line study and it is working very well. I get my on line lectures, readings, and assignments with only one touch. It has wonderful application  of S-pen and very much helpful for taking notes and other related study activities. It touch screen system is perfact. It supports all android applications. It keyboard is wonderful with pre-emptive facility. Your correct word with correct speling comes ourt after keying first 2-3 letters. It has very good options for internatioan use. I have purchased for on line study at US as well as at India.

Reviews.Title: Best Tab I have used
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Even though i use the S-Pen minimally, I like the Samsung Note 10.1 better than any other tab I have used. I have been using higher end Android tabs since the 2.x days, and replace them often to stay current. I also use them for both business and personal reasons. In my opinion, this is the best laid out, longest lasting, easiest to use, and most powerful tablet on the market. The S-Pen and Multi-Window capability make this unit better than anything else. The only way I can think you might prefer a different tablet is of you wanted the smaller Note 8 instead.

Reviews.Title: Best tablet avaliable! !
Reviews.Author: Calvin D. Nelson "The General"
Reviews.Content: I have owned numerous tablets and smartphones. The Samsung Galaxy Note 10.1  is the best yet. It is fast and loaded with apps and features I need. Samsung quality can not be beaten.  Easy to use.

Reviews.Title: turn it on and go
Reviews.Author: Kathleen A. Winchell "Kat"
Reviews.Content: love this. debated a tablet quite awhile, but so glad I bought one.  Love that it's so light and simple to use. Now I wonder why I waited. Wanted it to read with, but it's turned into so much more.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what it says
Reviews.Author: CTman
Reviews.Content: We use it as a family, mostly games, internet, social media.  Works great with good picture quality.  Wifi signal is as strong as our laptop around the house. Having the remote control app for the TV in it is a great bonus while being lazy on the couch.

Reviews.Title: Very nice Tablet
Reviews.Author: Michael Frattaroli
Reviews.Content: Very nice tablet. Have not had any problems, purchased one for me and another for my wife.  I travel and take it with me everywhere.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: Eric Richardson "'Living 4 HIM'"
Reviews.Content: It took me a while to adapt from my laptop. But now I feel just as comfortable using this device.  Its powerful and quick.  Glad I bought it!

Reviews.Title: i love it
Reviews.Author: Lorena
Reviews.Content: I like great shape size, connectivity, sounds, good applications, weight and size ideal , and is very compatible with programs.

Reviews.Title: Review of 3rd Note 10.1 still awesome!
Reviews.Author: Mark D
Reviews.Content: I have had quite a few tablets- Nexus 7, Kindle Fire 8.9HD(sucks), HP Touchpad, Asus Transformer etc.This tablet beats them all (except for the transformer in battery life only).Pros:Thin, light and rigid.Well madeFront facing speakers-Decent cameras front and rear.Tons of Ram for a tabletPowerful processor - no lag issues.Frequent updates- with useful added functionality,Built in stylus- and apps- If you are in school/college- the program that turns your writing into formulas and solvers them- priceless.Best Feature- ability to split screen apps, or float apps in foreground over other apps.>Web browser on one side- note pad, calculator, book etc on the other- Works with many apps- but not all so be aware(Kindle I'm looking at you)Cons-Tablets can always. Always be made lighter. The Note 10.1 is lighter than many rivals- but add a case/cover and hold it and read for a few hours and you will wish it was lighter.I would love to see the bezel size shrink to 1/2 of it's current size.Speakers are good(for a tablet)- there's the problem- I want good speakers.Battery life has been good 7.5-8hrs of web browsing on wifi with screen brightness at 40-50% indoors. 10-13hrs of wifi off reading on the kindle app. I know in the next year or 2 that 24hr battery life is a possibility.As is the problem with android in general some apps will not work - check before you buy the tablet if it is important to you.This is as close to a laptop replacement as I have been able to find so far, I have bought 3 of these now-1 for me and 1 for each of my 2 kids and we are all having similar results.I bought the first one in November 2013($499), The two I bought recently were refurbs- (300 each)- and have worked flawlessly.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: Eric Richardson "'Living 4 HIM'"
Reviews.Content: It took me a while to adapt from my laptop. But now I feel just as comfortable using this device.  Its powerful and quick.  Glad I bought it!

Reviews.Title: i love it
Reviews.Author: Lorena
Reviews.Content: I like great shape size, connectivity, sounds, good applications, weight and size ideal , and is very compatible with programs.

Reviews.Title: Review of 3rd Note 10.1 still awesome!
Reviews.Author: Mark D
Reviews.Content: I have had quite a few tablets- Nexus 7, Kindle Fire 8.9HD(sucks), HP Touchpad, Asus Transformer etc.This tablet beats them all (except for the transformer in battery life only).Pros:Thin, light and rigid.Well madeFront facing speakers-Decent cameras front and rear.Tons of Ram for a tabletPowerful processor - no lag issues.Frequent updates- with useful added functionality,Built in stylus- and apps- If you are in school/college- the program that turns your writing into formulas and solvers them- priceless.Best Feature- ability to split screen apps, or float apps in foreground over other apps.>Web browser on one side- note pad, calculator, book etc on the other- Works with many apps- but not all so be aware(Kindle I'm looking at you)Cons-Tablets can always. Always be made lighter. The Note 10.1 is lighter than many rivals- but add a case/cover and hold it and read for a few hours and you will wish it was lighter.I would love to see the bezel size shrink to 1/2 of it's current size.Speakers are good(for a tablet)- there's the problem- I want good speakers.Battery life has been good 7.5-8hrs of web browsing on wifi with screen brightness at 40-50% indoors. 10-13hrs of wifi off reading on the kindle app. I know in the next year or 2 that 24hr battery life is a possibility.As is the problem with android in general some apps will not work - check before you buy the tablet if it is important to you.This is as close to a laptop replacement as I have been able to find so far, I have bought 3 of these now-1 for me and 1 for each of my 2 kids and we are all having similar results.I bought the first one in November 2013($499), The two I bought recently were refurbs- (300 each)- and have worked flawlessly.

Reviews.Title: Exactly as Expected
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "wild-cooking-woman"
Reviews.Content: I needed a tablet which would allow me to take quick notes without having to type on a virtual keyboard.This is exactly what I wanted. It does not do Flash, but in theory can be encouraged to do so with outside software. It is the right size for someone who needs a nit of help seeing, and the clarity of the screen i more than adequate.I really like my Note.

Reviews.Title: The Pen is Awesome
Reviews.Author: Troy Butcher
Reviews.Content: The S Pen is one of the coolest things ever.  There are so many options like pen size, color choices.  You really have to try it out before you buy a different tablet because in my opinion - it's worth it for the pen.  Wish I would have waited to buy one - its selling on Yugster.com today for $464

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: Hannah Fritch
Reviews.Content: I love this tablet. (I'm using it to type this review) the battery life is GREAT I was concerned about that when I bought it but it met my expectations. Great sound and screen. Very happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Being productive at home
Reviews.Author: Noel Sandoval
Reviews.Content: I bought my galaxy note because I use to carry my laptop from work to home. Now I just leave my laptop at the office and use my galaxy at home, found two or three task that still requires me a laptop, but is just because I do'n't like the high cost of savig data "on the cloud"

Reviews.Title: Excelent tablet
Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: This tablet is very nice, it looks better than an ipad and it works very well. It has a fast web browser and all the features are nice.

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: Cameo
Reviews.Content: I really enjoy this product. Getting everything to work is amazing.  It's even better when you start to personalize it and get it to work to your own needs.  I can see everything on one page if I need to.  It runs everything perfectly. This is a perfect tool for students and artists.  I chose this over the Microsoft Surface Pro because of the price and the weight. This is way more user friendly.

Reviews.Title: my present
Reviews.Author: janet maryland thorbourne
Reviews.Content: see my review for the samsung leather case.  The whole package is is great according to my son, and I know it will be used for various functions.  Little pricey but if it makes someone , then it is well worth it.

Reviews.Title: awesome tablet!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: stephen
Reviews.Content: I had a nook which I really liked, but this tablet is the best for what I needed. I would recommend it to anyone

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: kinder
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for our nephew and he has used it for school and personal, and he loves it.  Says it is the best, and the split screen feature really helps when he has a paper to write.

Reviews.Title: great device
Reviews.Author: Celine ormond
Reviews.Content: it's really nice. we all love it, parents, kids, everyone. high quality machine. lightning fast with downloads and installs. just fast in general, touch interface is sweet too. recommended.

Reviews.Title: wonderful tablet
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Beach Ron"
Reviews.Content: For a windows user this tablet is a great addition. I find myself using the tablet more and the laptop less, reading email and browsing are great. The battery is great, l only charge it when needed, every couple of days, display is very readable. The browser works fine for most web sites, but has some trouble with selection of lists and dropdowns. I find myself still using the laptop to set up new web sites to my likeing and the using the tablet to view the site. I still store emails on the laptop so am careful which emails I delete on the tablet. The only big problem is I have been unable to get a spellchecker to work for other apps and I miss it.

Reviews.Title: Sure beats my previous Ipad.
Reviews.Author: JackMc
Reviews.Content: Love,  love,  love this tablet and the way that it syncs with my Samsung Note phone.  Use these devices for all my daily communications needs. Downside is that Samsung my the unwise choice to not be printer friendly with any device other than a Samsung printer. A major error on their part as most people have other preferences on printers. I personally only use HP products for my printing needs and have always been satisfied with their products and length of use of their cartridges.  This is the only downside to this tablet.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Overall
Reviews.Author: Thomas J. Bryant
Reviews.Content: Highly recommended for professionals, students, artists, parents, anyone! Very good build and weight . . . and the battery life is better than expected,This tablet replaced my laptop for home and work use!The handwriting keyboard input is amazing . . . it understands my chicken scratch!

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: Delores Everage
Reviews.Content: This has been just the one for me!!  I haven't used it every day, but the times I have; it has done what I wanted it to!  Very nice!!

Reviews.Title: Very Satisfied!
Reviews.Author: Owen L. Bouma
Reviews.Content: I am very satisfied with my Samsung Galaxy Note.  It has all the features I need and is very easy to use.  Not only is it lightweight and easy to carry in my purse or bag, it allows me instant access to all areas I deem important.  I especially like the feature and use the pen in taking notes, thus eliminating lots of paper and the possibility of losing important notes.  Although, I am a new user and received this as a gift, I am truly excited about the new dimension opened to me.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: Jessica LaMantia
Reviews.Content: This tablet is great! I love everything about it, and the battery is EXCELLENT! I bought this for school to download e-textbooks, and it does the job, not to mention the screen is gorgeous and the stylus is a nice plus!

Reviews.Title: Love. It.
Reviews.Author: Texas Mom
Reviews.Content: I'm not super tech-savvy, and I don't use this for work. So this review may help someone like me who just wanted a tablet for fun (internet use around the house, games, etc),  portability (movies and games on the go for the kids and me), and other things like calendar, etc. I'm a homeschooling stay at home mom of 3. I check email, look at pinterest/facebook, and do some reading. I also listen to music quite a bit from amazon cloud and pandora.I probably would've been fine with a cheaper tablet, but my husband and I felt like if we were going to spend the money, we may as well make a good investment the first time. We did a lot of research and chose the galaxy note. I love it. The final selling point fornus was the sd card capability. I can put my kids movies on an sd card instead of having to take up space on the tab. Not a big deal for some, but I liked that.The camera is awesome too. Sound is great. I don't usethe stylus much, but it's cool.Overall the tablet is sleek and very user friendly. We are happy we paid a bit more for this one over another.

Reviews.Title: great tablet, needs better build quality
Reviews.Author: Ben
Reviews.Content: This is the 4th tablet I've bought, but the first I plan on keeping.I'm happy with everything about it but the build quality. I'm fine with a plastic body so long as it feels sturdy, but this tablet doesn't. The leather case I bought with it gives me piece of mind about having it in my backpack. I wouldn't trust it without a case. I've had 2 samsung phones and a tablet of theirs, the quality was much higher.It's been great for school. I have to read a ton of pdfs and MS word docs. The general productivity is good. I noticed many apps don't interact well with windowed viewing. They open fine but when you resize them the content won't rescale. I would like if it remembered the resizing for each app.S-pen isn't as functional as I'd like. It is very precise for altering/highlighting document, and I'm sure if I did any graphics it would shine. I do prefer papyrus beta over snote, it's just a more realistic replacement for pen and paper. I do enjoy Snotes formula feature very much.Gaming  wise it's a beast. I've bought and played a few games that have high end tablet graphics and they play great. The only time there is lag is when high detail water is rendered in a game like wild blood.The form factor is top notch. Everything feels like it's where it should be. The front facing dual speakers are perfectly placed. I hope very much samsung keeps this general design in future models.I would also love a higher resolution. I hear that samsung it actually coming out with a tablet that matches the ipad. They will be king when that happens.

Reviews.Title: Seamless transition for Samsung smartphone owners.
Reviews.Author: JCar11
Reviews.Content: This was a very easy transition out of the box, since I have the Galaxy Note smartphone.  Everything was intuitive and easy to use.  The pad has more features, faster processor, and more memory (32Gb) than the other units we compared it to.  Memory can be augmented via an SD card, also.  We have not been disappointed in any respect.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Daly "Kenneth"
Reviews.Content: Pros:1.- Double RAM so better performance.2.- Option to increase storage with card. up to 64GB3.- Pen: Excellent idea. quite useful!4.- Excellent sensitivity on screen touch, smooth5.- Connect  a Bluetooth mouse and a keyboard and you have almost a portable computer!Cons:1.- Charging connector  should be on the side not the bottom to allow its use while standing (or to have a lateral entry of the cable)2.- It could have an additional mini usb connector (even more than one).Comparative:Android OS and tons of apps in Google play store and awesome apps available for free on Samsung store seamless integration with Google account makes it a much better choice than to be jailed within one store (with very few free apps).

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Mari
Reviews.Content: Im not going to go into all tech specs that you can read online. It came as advertised. Very happy with stylus and display quality. Only issue I have so far is the keyboard when typing anything lengthy can be cumbersome because I have issues with the space bar so I have to reread everything and add spaces. Very happy with picture and video quality although I have not printed any pictures yet.It was exactly what I hoped it would be. A tool for: email, internet browsing, playing music, watching videos, reading books when I dont feel like bringing my Kindle in addition to this tablet, and somewhat educational games to occupy my son when I need it. Perfect size to fit in my bag.

Reviews.Title: Love It
Reviews.Author: Tristan
Reviews.Content: It's worth every penny. I wish I had bought one sooner. It runs smoothly, does everything I need and more. My primary use is note taking and gaming. I have no complaints. The picture quality on the screen is fantastic and there is no lag whatsoever. I'd recommend it to a friend.

Reviews.Title: l love this!
Reviews.Author: Anisha
Reviews.Content: I do not know who I lived without it in my life. This great. I bought it for Christmas and it goes everywhere with me. I encourage anyone who is thinking about purchasing this device...Go for it...only downside is the way it charges. It only charges when plugged into the Adapter. This can be frustrating. I received the software update and its great. Love the S pen...makes note taking and drawing games easier.  I'm so protective I wont let my daughter look at it...lol but I LOVE IT♡♡♡♡♡

Reviews.Title: Really like it
Reviews.Author: RnLnC
Reviews.Content: I did a lot of research online and then went to try it out at Best Buy. If I were going to buy a tablet this is the one I would get. My use is primarily for reading scientific articles/taking notes on PDFs for classes/ using the Spen for sketching out genetics problems when I don't have paper. I'm just waiting for the price to go down over the next few months (hopefully...)Edit: 3/3/13I played around with this the other day and was wondering if there is a way to get the formula tool in S-note to display the answer to math equations? I can get the tablet to convert my handwritten formulas to computer font, but I can't find a way to import the answer from Wolfram, or easier, for S-note to automatically calculate and display the answer. I'm just doing simple equations like: 5x10^10/3.456 and other such arithmetic. Anyone else have suggestions as to how to make use of the Note for such uses as lab research (biochemistry experiment notes and calculations)?

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Note
Reviews.Author: V. Gorman "V. Gorman"
Reviews.Content: I love my Samsung Galaxy Note 10".  I use it daily instead of my laptop.  Very convenient to carry around wherever I go.  Can't wait to take it on my vacation!

Reviews.Title: Lovely
Reviews.Author: A. Ortiz "A.Ortiz"
Reviews.Content: I love it!!!!! So much better than a ipad whatever but I love yhe s pen and I can get back on my drawings. Wonderfully packed save which is a big plus.....thank you

Reviews.Title: Really Good
Reviews.Author: Rafael Amaya
Reviews.Content: I like it, it is a good product. I am still learnuing to use it but it has many funtion better than the other one.

Reviews.Title: Really Good
Reviews.Author: Rafael Amaya
Reviews.Content: I like it, it is a good product. I am still learnuing to use it but it has many funtion better than the other one.

Reviews.Title: Galaxy note 10.1....Love it
Reviews.Author: D. Culp "debiscruisin"
Reviews.Content: This tablet is everything I wanted in a tablet.  I am a travel agent and need to be more mobile with my business and this certainly makes my job easier.

Reviews.Title: A tablet to be in your wishlist
Reviews.Author: Ahmed Muaz
Reviews.Content: Excellent tablet, as compared to our The Ipad, this one is quite awesome. Multitasking, pen, processing all aspects are sueprb. I was an Apple user a couple of years ago but Android OS gives me real power to play with.

Reviews.Title: In love
Reviews.Author: Christina Hartley
Reviews.Content: Just got this today, and its perfect. Haven't tried using it in school yet, but it seems like I might be checking my social networks a lot more then id like. It's very fast, and it will take some getting used to.

Reviews.Title: Just awesome!
Reviews.Author: Erick Gomez
Reviews.Content: This tablet its amazing, its smooth, fast, multitasking!I think this its best tab from samsung. I was only a little conserned because the package was opened with the broken seal

Reviews.Title: So Happy with it.  Highly Recommend it
Reviews.Author: Skin Thirst "Terry"
Reviews.Content: Dump the Apple and get with Samsung.  They are kicking Apple's butt.  I was just told today by a classmate she can not get Adobe Reader on her Apple tablet--is this true?? She was impressed with my Samsung and wants to get one.GREAT TABLET!  Fast.  Haven't had Any Problems....

Reviews.Title: Great tablet for students
Reviews.Author: Vincent English
Reviews.Content: If you are a student looking for a tablet to use to take notes, this is the one for you. S Note allows accurate handwriting and drawing when taking notes and even has the ability to record audio at the same time. It is also great for annotating pdf's or other documents. Beyond the capabilities of the S pen, the tablet is still one of the better ones on the market. It features the ability to multitask by having two separate applications open at the same time side-by-side and now has Android 4.1.2 which adds a number of new features and overall improvements along with Samsung's "Premium Suite".

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Note 10.1 (32GB, Deep Grey)
Reviews.Author: Cliff Benedict
Reviews.Content: It is a fine piece of equipment and happy that I purchased it.  I have not begin to find all the things that can be found on this tablet.  I recommend it for anyone wanting a good quality tablet.

Reviews.Title: Sansung Galaxy Note 10.1
Reviews.Author: Vince Loynes
Reviews.Content: It does everything it is supposed to so far. LIke the S pen feature. Easy to use and get started

Reviews.Title: Got it four days ago.
Reviews.Author: Shellbe
Reviews.Content: LOVE IT!!!!  Still tryin to figure out ALLLLL the things I can do with my tablet. Stay tuned.....I'll keep you posted.

Reviews.Title: Good tablet for 2012
Reviews.Author: KSTAMM
Reviews.Content: The technical specs will tell you this is a fast tablet with many capabilities. What sold me was the unique feature of the Galaxy Note: the writing stylus. It's not just any stylus, but an actual wacom-style digitizer, enabling pressure sensitivity. That kind of detail is the difference between sketching with a pencil and a ballpoint pen. I'm no artist, but it lets the software read your handwriting better than any other device. If youre sick of typing and want to just take notes, go to a brick&mortar; store and give this tablet a whirl.

Reviews.Title: Good Job
Reviews.Author: David Marshall
Reviews.Content: My first tablet - but I've tinkered around with others.  I recommend downloading the documentation from Samsung and reading through it.

Reviews.Title: Love this tablet!
Reviews.Author: Deborah B. Simon
Reviews.Content: The Samsung Galaxy Note 10.1 is everything I wanted and needed!  Fingerprints do show on the screen but no problem.

Reviews.Title: Really great pad.
Reviews.Author: Felix
Reviews.Content: So much better than Ipad. Great tool for artist to sketches. And buttery is OK enough.But what the most great part is so much software to enough!

Reviews.Title: Love it!!!!
Reviews.Author: Carol Eaton "2kewljewels"
Reviews.Content: I love my new tablet. I think it's superior to the iPad in so many ways. I'm glad I got the 32 gig as it was only $50.00 more.

Reviews.Title: Best tablet available for digital artist
Reviews.Author: Edward J Villegas
Reviews.Content: Digital artist looking for to sketch on the go, this is the tablet to go with. 1024 levels of pressure by wacom. I don't have to explain anything further. Closest thing to a mobile version of a cintiq. Some drawing apps to recommend is Layerpaint and tvpaint.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT, BUT.........
Reviews.Author: Stacey Davis
Reviews.Content: I truly love my Samsung Galaxy and because I'm a droid girl, I would never consider Apple product. However, I have noticed that there's an issue with flash player, so right now I'm not able to view video on sites that require flash player. I know this is an adobe thing, but I haven't figured it out just yet, which is why the 4 star rating. Once I'm able to see full episodes of shows that I've missed, I will adjust to 5 stars!!!!!

Reviews.Title: my first tablet
Reviews.Author: Sebaie
Reviews.Content: Well this is my first tablet ever.  The 10 inch display is fine plus its size and weight. I think the processor is fine and speedy. the new android does support the Arabic language but I found a fine tool called swiftkey for tablet which did the job fine plus many features like the auto complete feature. the battery is ok especially when you use a power saver,  thanks to to the android market. My kids liked it too,  and I see it has got many educational capabilities. As a desktop user, I began to get used to it and use it in my work as writer. I think I am happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Nice Android
Reviews.Author: shimon
Reviews.Content: Looked for Samsung Android Tablet having good experience with cellphone.Has fast browsing and email.Nice intuitive interface.Good integration and sync with Google account: Gmail, Google Drive, Chrome Bookmarks.Hebrew language and keyboard were missing, installed them from Play store.Chrome Browser must improve, Dolphin is better.Still learning.Shimon

Reviews.Title: Finally!
Reviews.Author: Mobile User
Reviews.Content: After trying out tabs from other manufacturers, I go back to Samsung and, as usual, am not disappointed - Lightning fast CPU, NO screen bleed whatsoever, S-Pen works like a charm (even with a screen protector...All over a solid tablet.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Tamra Waywood
Reviews.Content: Exactly what I expected and so much more!! My first pda had a stylus, so I'm very used to using one. LOVE, LOVE, LOVE IT!!!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: cass
Reviews.Content: I really like Samsung and this is no exception. I have the phone and they are easy to navigate and apps are easy to use. The screen is clear and no problems with speed or function.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Note 10.1
Reviews.Author: Mike from Jersey
Reviews.Content: This tablet replaces a new Apple iPad 16 Gig 3rd Gen device I just received for Christmas. After testing the iPad out I understand why those in the know say that Apple has lost touch with their customer base in virtually every aspect as there is nothing about the iPad  I'm flattered with! Goodbye Siri, it was short but sweet. Hello Iris!

Reviews.Title: Bought for my son and he says it is the best tablet on the market.
Reviews.Author: Anthony L. Baggett
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son as a Christmas present and he loves it. This is an amazing device that will do so many things.

Reviews.Title: novice opinion
Reviews.Author: Paul L. Mccament "olescruff"
Reviews.Content: This is my first tablet so I'm new to the whole thing. I bought it so I could stay in touch while traveling. Although I haven't used it much it appears to have everything I need. I am very satisfied with all the features I have used up to this time.

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: ashraf
Reviews.Content: it works good with all functions ,the speed is good because of the 2 g.b ram , until now it works good with no hanging the only thing that I hope to be in that 32 note is to include 3G .

Reviews.Title: Would highly recommend!
Reviews.Author: Kyle L. Bastie
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet a few weeks ago and I love it.  I use an Android phone, so it made sense for me to get an Android tablet.  The processor is fast and the interface user-friendly. The camera is not the best, but I have no plans for using the camera anyway, I use my phone for that or my SLR camera.  For me, it was the perfect choice.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Claudia M Childress
Reviews.Content: Love my note book and use it every day...as I use it I am getting better and better at using all the functions that it has... I find it easier to use then my friends I pad so I am very happy...this was an early Christmas present from my husband..Love it.

Reviews.Title: Must  Upgrade the Bugy Bundled Photoshop Touch (Free)
Reviews.Author: Ananto Pratikno
Reviews.Content: One of my reasons I bought note 10.1 is I like to manipulate photo. I thought note 10.1 and Photoshop Touch would work for a light image manipulation. A tablet with a real precise stylus and a good image manipulating apps. It is the only option I have  for now.The tablet is as I expected, good display, very fast, smooth, 50% battery enough for 3 hours, not good looking as iPad, easy to setup, bundled with a lot of apps or widgets that I feel too much.The bundled Photoshop Touch ver 1.2 has some bugs. The most  bug bothered me is unable to merge several layers I have created or merged became an empty layer. It didn't surprised me. A lot of apps came with bugs nowadays.I visited the Google Play and Samsung and found Photoshop Touch ver 1.4. But it isn't FREE update. Since I don't want to spend more time to resolve it, I just purchased the ver 1.4. Yes the bug was gone. And improved interface.I would rate 5 stars if I could upgrade the Photoshop Touch for free.UPDATE 1/11/2013Now there is free upgrade to ver 1.4.2. It  fixed a lot of bugs. I change  the rating  now. Go to Samsumg Apps and download for free.I have changed my review title, it was "Could be Best if There is Free Upgrade for Bugjy Bundled Photoshop Touch"

Reviews.Title: not perfect, but so far so good
Reviews.Author: D. SKye Hodges
Reviews.Content: orderd through Amazon via Amazon, received what was obviously a previously opened box (the protective stickers were horribly re-applied, fingerprints everywhere, completely 100% dead battery).  I'm not happy that this is being sold as "new" and I get a box that has already been opened.Other than that, so far everything is as expected.

Reviews.Title: Even better than expected...
Reviews.Author: mj23ChiFan
Reviews.Content: I have been waiting for this device since its "teased" debut back in February '12. Six months later, I finally have my hands on one (literally, as I type this) and I'm not disappointed in any way. It's fast, smooth, the pen is amazingly accurate for note taking and drawing, and despite its "lower resolution" compared to some new tablets, the screen is amazing. I'd rather have the dual-core processor crunching my input, than being eaten up just to make the screen resolution "better". Unless you hold it an inch from your face (and why would you do that?!), it looks amazing. The ONLY thing I wish was better is the hand-writing-to-text feature... it's not 100% accurate, at least not with MY hand-writing. Overall, Apple fanboys can keep their iPads... I'm MORE than happy with my Note 10.1. Way to go, Samsung... and THANK YOU for making me one very happy customer!

Reviews.Title: great¡
Reviews.Author: Michael Robert
Reviews.Content: This tablet has lived up to all my expectations. Its apps, internet, and drawing programs work well. I recomend this tablet to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: Deb Schroeder
Reviews.Content: This is the best thing since Al Gore invented the internet.......it took me a little while to get used to the S pen, but I hope there will be more apps comming for it

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!!
Reviews.Author: Kettle
Reviews.Content: Love this tablet.  I really like being able to write notes.  If anyone calls me, all I have to do is take that pen out, window pops up and I can start writing.  I don't have to look for paper (never got close by) and a pen (never can find one of them when you need it).  I think white is very classy looking.  I am a big fan of android.  The display is so clear.  Can't say enough great stuff about it!!

Reviews.Title: Samsung Note 10.1
Reviews.Author: Kenneth E Backus
Reviews.Content: I am not a big advocate of tablets but find the Samsung note a very practical and good priced device.  I use it at home or in Hotels with WiFi and on the road with my AT&T; Hotspot device, so the lack of 3G is of no concern.  I use to have an IPAD with 3G and found it more expensive than using the WiFi with a hotspot device.  It connects easily and works just like it should.  For the price and ease of use I would definately recommend the Samsung Note 10.1 over more highly priced tablets.

Reviews.Title: Feature-Packed Tablet, Better than Expected
Reviews.Author: Michael P. Kukielka "BORG"
Reviews.Content: The Note 10.1 packs some impressive specs and features and makes the best case for a stylus yet.  Although the display is colorful and vivid, the resolution lags other tablets in this price class like the Asus Transformer Pad Infinity and the iPad (3rd Gen).  While I like this tablet, there are many pros and cons to consider.Pros:Speakers: Stereo speakers which face the user make this the best sounding tablet by far!Display: Vivid and colorful IPS LCD screen with no light-bleeding at the edgesS-Pen:  Stylus based on WACOM tech is far more accurate and versatile than capacitive based pens on standard touch screens which adds things such as pressure sensitivity and proximity awareness.  The handwriting recognition tech works remarkably well, but you have to be patient and careful in practice.Features and Customization:  Samsung's TouchWiz UX brings a ton of features and customization, including side-by-side windowing and a pop-out video player.Design: The tablet feels very comfortable in the hand with nice rounded edges.  I also like the two-tone white and silver plastics, the white in particular has a nice pearlescent finish.Specs: Some impressive internal specs with 2GBs of RAMCons:Display: Screen resolution is very low compared to the competition which makes this poor for reading text.Construction: All plastic construction which creeks and flexes to a small degree.Performance: Despite it's impressive specs, the tablet is noticeably laggy in all aspects of its operation.  The complexity of TouchWiz and the variety of features contribute to this problem and might be cured with future updates (Jelly Bean).Camera:  The camera records video in 720p instead of 1080p, and takes mediocre stills.  Many tablet cameras are doing 1080p video.Multitasking: Side-By-Side windowing works only with Samsung apps, and the concept doesn't work that well in execution since you can't interact with both windows simultaneously.

Reviews.Title: SD card not properly used.
Reviews.Author: Dr.Z
Reviews.Content: Warning... Samsung tablets and phones do not allow you to store apps in the SD memory. I did not know this and now it has become a real problem. I bought this 16G tablet and installed a 16G SD card.  The internal memory is now almost full but my SD is still nearly empty because Samsung will not allow any apps to move to the SD card.  All you can put there are pictures, music, etc.  I have a cheap 7" non Samsung tablet and I can move apps as I want.  The Android system permits it.  To tell the truth, I bought this tablet over an Apple because I did not want the rigid control Apple imposes on users.  Now I find out too late that Samsung is worse.  Samsung told me that the reason they want apps on the main memory is for speed of access.  It seems reasonable that it is the user who should determine if speed or memory space is more important.  Samsung's answer to my complaint was to tell me to delete some apps.

Reviews.Title: NOT HAPPY!!!! Got a defective product!
Reviews.Author: Sam Sanderson
Reviews.Content: I got the Samsung Galaxy Note 10.1 a couple months ago for my girlfriend for Christmas 2013. About a month ago it basically started having seizures. The touchscreen keyboard goes nuts with ghost typing; it opens and closes programs, goes from one page to the other, and has acutally changed settings as well. It gets even WORSE when the tablet pen is pulled out, all of a sudden if freezes and then freaks out even more. It doesn't stop even long enough for me to hold down the power key and turn the device off completely.I have researched everything, and can not find anything on why it is doing this, or how to fix it! My girlfriend has taken video footage with her phone (an Apple phone, that she has never had a problem with she says) of this device freaking out for minutes on end. It has been doing this off and on for a month/month and half.I researched this tablet vs. the iPad for months, and this tablet came out on top! I am really upset at the lemon that I got. We can't do anything on it, we can't even get to the home screen without it going nuts. I rated it 3 stars, because I am sure it's an ok product, but the one we got is a HUGE disappointment, especially coming from Samsung!!!I have already emailed the company that I bought it from, hopefully they step up and help me out, because a lot of money was paid for a dud product! My girlfriend and I are not happy with it.

Reviews.Title: slow wifi on the note 10.1
Reviews.Author: Tim Archey
Reviews.Content: I really liked note 10.1 until I connected to wifi. My 5 year old laptop thats connected to my home network is alot faster. I would have rated this 5 stars if it wasn't slow.  Pleade do a google search for slow wifi on the note 10.1.Tim

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Note 10.1
Reviews.Author: Biyka
Reviews.Content: A great Tablet. Better than the Ipad. I rate this tablet better than the Ipad. You can plug your external USB Hard Drive in and watch Movies etc.Also has some great App's.

Reviews.Title: I-LOVE-MY-SAMSUNG-GALAXAY NOTE-10.1"-TABLET!!!!  It's absolutly everything I expected it to be, and more!
Reviews.Author: Stace "styce"
Reviews.Content: I read the reviews on every tablet that was available.. from ...  "Asus"..  (every model that was priced $400. - $600... ).. Kindles, The new "Kindle Fire"..  Dell.. Motorola..  and many more.I admit, I did have a rather hard time making my final decision.However, this Samsung Galaxy Note 10.1 Tablet had been my 1st. Choice from the beginning. The reviews were great..  & (for the most part)...  all of these products had at least 1-2 people that had a complaint. Most of these complaints were the fault of the operator/owner..This is one "Hellava-Great-Notebook-Computer/Droid Tablet!!!!You know what the ol' saying is..  "Alway go with your initial choice"..Happily, I AM EVER-SOOOOOOO-PLEASE that I did ! ! ! ! *Amazon is without a doubt, my favorite online seller.. I can find all the information I need to know, regarding any product..  their price are always  compatiable.. shipping is almost always very fast.. teriffic Customer Service.. also, one other good service is, they always run items that you may need for your purchase, such as, in my case w/ this Galaxy Note.. "Compatiable and great priced 32g, memory card.. assorted cases, charging docks & USB cables.. headphones.. and much more"... AMAZON ALWAYS STANDS BEHIND THIER CUSTOMERS & THE PRODUCTS THEY PURCHASE..DON'T HESITATE.. OR.. YOU JUST MAY BE TOO-LATE !THANK YOU AMAZON.. FOR ALL THE INFO., THE MANY REVIEWS, YOUR SUGGESTIONS, GOOD PRICES & CUSTOMER SERVICE !.. for because of all these services, as a whole.. I did make the right decision, A-GREAT-DECISION.. "SAMSUNG GALAXY NOTE'S-10.1"..IS A TOTAL 5*+

Reviews.Title: Flash Player??
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This is my first tablet and I'm really enjoying using it. However, I wonder if there is a user guide to help me with the different features that are available.  The young man at Best Buy told me there wasn't one and I just needed to play with it and figure things out on my own.  Ha, ha! Oh boy, this really won't work for me.  I'll end up just using the very basics and miss out on some neat features.Also when so much on the internet requires Adobe Flash Player and this doesn't support it, what is one to do?  Maybe I'm just doing something wrong or don't know what to download. When I go to the download site it tells me that, "This item isn't available in your country." Can someone help me? I've scoured the internet and so far can't find an answer. Some of my favorite websites require Flash Player and then have to go back to my laptop. Had I known this, I probably would have bought an ipad.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: BLB
Reviews.Content: I have an IPhone, Mac Air and had IPad 3. I grew tired of the IPad. Its great but was looking for something lighter and thinner. I tried the ASUS Infinity and immediately returned it. I am very happy.

Reviews.Title: It does a good job except for note taking
Reviews.Author: haneke
Reviews.Content: I liked the device in general as a tablet, it does a lot of things well. Quite smooth processing, GPS is very nice. Multitasking is well-thought. But I don't think that the NOTE app that comes with the tablet is useful for people basically looking for advanced note taking features. My main dislike of its note-taking features is caused by the handwriting to text conversion (dis)abilities of the NOTE app.I am a PhD student in History and I take written notes from my readings and archival documents. So I was for a long time looking for a good device that can properly convert what is written into digital text in an organized manner. I watched various videos of Lenovo Thinkpad Tablet in use and it didn't seem bad to me in general. Yet I had some reservations with the general performance of the device so I waited with the hope that stylus technologies and software will improve and a better device will come out soon. When I first heard about Samsung Note 10.1 thought that this would be the one and got excited though it is more expensive than Lenovo. And purchased it immediately. But I am really disappointed with its note-taking capabilities (My wife disliked it more than I did). I am not a well versed person in technical issues and I don't have much information about tablets and note taking technology but I think I know what will be a satisfying device for my needs and for people who are looking for a convenient and user friendly note-taking tablet.So I think the software on Samsung Note 10.1 is really poor except for everyday simple note-taking tasks like preparing to-do lists or taking very quick, casual notes. It even makes your casual notes more casual when it converts them to digital text. Very annoying.I think that Lenovo does a better job in note-taking -especially in converting the handwriting to text- as far as I understand from the videos I watched about Lenovo and from my experience with Samsung Note 10.1.Samsung Note 10.1 recognizes your handwriting well and converts it to text rightly most of the times. (Indeed my wife also complained about the errors in conversion; my handwriting is better, so it performs enough overall with my handwriting). I don't find writing very uncomfortable but not very enjoyable too. You cannot get the feeling of writing on a paper and do get a sense of plasticity. This might be a common situation with note taking on tablets though.It is also a little bit sloppy in displaying what you write. There is sometimes a slight lag in instantly showing what you write. It occasionally cannot respond well to your writing and misses some parts of what you scribe, especially if it is small in size.I mostly get pleasure from writing with a pen on paper. I understand the limits of writing on a tablet and don't set my standards so high and don't expect a similar performance from writing on a tablet with writing on a paper. But I don't feel that writing takes place with ease on this tablet. My handwriting looks worse than it actually is and I cannot write smoothly and small enough. Writing small is important with this device because the converted text ends where your handwriting ends, so I was trying to write smaller to put as much words as possible in one line to get more organized final text. Though I didn't had the best experience when writing, I could bear it if the software had performed satisfactorily.But I think the main problem starts when the NOTE application converts what is written. It is not very easy to correct or delete what is written. First of all, the wait time before conversion when you ceased writing is not long enough - at least for me (I don't know if there is a setting to lag this time). So it gives you little thinking time while writing and puts you into discomfort since you cannot write when it is converting. Sometimes you try to continue writing after a short break for thinking and what you write cannot be displayed. This can be a problem if you are writing fast without looking at the screen; for example in the classroom.The worse thing is when NOTE app converts a second group of words after pausing writing, the first word of what you write anew joins "without any space" the last word of what is written before. You have to push the space button first on the top menu before you continue to write. This surely disrupts a continuous writing experience, especially considering its short waiting time before conversion. You cannot immediately start writing where you left as in natural writing.And you have to press "enter" to go to the next line when you go on to write after pausing, which nonetheless makes sense.But my main frustration is with its inadequacy of aligning the converted text. It actually creates a box of text when you start writing. If you want to write to somewhere else you have to create another box (paragraph) by pushing a specific button on the top menu. And I didn't like the way these boxes work. Managing them is quite cumbersome.When you are writing in a box, if you start writing in the next line it will convert your writings to the next line. This is good but the biggest issue here is when you arrive at the end of the line with your handwriting and go on to write without pause in the next line, the text will start in the next line although it has a lot of space till the end in digital format. So you won't get formated lines but irregularly short and long lines. It looks like what sometimes happens when you convert a PDF document to Word. And when you stop writing in the selected box the size of the box is determined by the size of the longest line, which means if you write a long set of text your box will extend as a long vertical box. It looks weird and irregular with other boxes with different width. I tried to write smaller so that the box would be wider but my handwriting wasn't small enough to put more words than the preset font of the digital text. And I couldn't find a way to set the font size (maybe there is, I am open to suggestions). I think Lenovo Thinkpad, actually MyScript Notes Mobile app, makes a better job in this respect, because it continues to add words to the digital text until the digital text arrives at the end of the line.So It is a pain to manage converted text in this tables. You have to go to the specific box you want to edit and have to arrange the lines by the left, right, enter, space or back space buttons. You cannot select a word or add one in between two words -which generally happens in the natural flow of writing- by pointing out the location with the pen but you have to scroll to that specific location by using the right and left buttons on the top. You cannot delete a word by selecting it either -or by crossing it out as in Lenovo thinkpad. These are some of the quite inconvenient and clumsy features of the software. There are a lot like these. In sum, you cannot correct mistakes occurred during writing or during conversion to text when you are taking fast notes, for example whilst listening to someone. You cannot immediately interfere in a previously written section of the text. It will also take a lot of time to adjust the lines if you want to do so after you finish writing. So it is weird that it is a lot faster to type with your keyboard on your computer than writing with your hand on this device.Good thing is if you pause and continue writing, you can write anywhere and it will convert the text where you left but you have to put a space before you start as I said.If you want to write to somewhere else you have to open a new box from the top menu. You can change the size of the boxes but the text does not adjust to the new size, so you cannot widen the text as you wish. You have to go to the beginning of each line and press back space button on the top to adjust lines.What is also ridiculous about Note app is that you cannot go back and convert a selected section of handwritten -unconverted- text you wrote on Notes. Adding such an option could save some time and partially compensate for mentioned shortcomings of the Notes app because writing on handwriting mode without instant conversion is more comfortable. This shortcoming finally made me realize that this thing is not intended for well-organized, professional note-taking purposes.In sum, formatting and editing are really bad in this application. It even looks amateurish. I don't know if this device brings a good standard for the current tablets and note-taking software  technology so far but I don't think that the software for note-taking and especially for text conversion in this device will satisfy a common group of users who have expectations other than simple entertainment and very simplistic note-taking tasks.To say the least, this device is far from being user friendly, functional and effective, considering that you spend a lot of time to put it into work and cannot get half the results you get from writing on a paper or even from typing. It doesn't seem that mentioned shortcomings are irremediable. The main issue that annoys me is that it looks like they didn't give much thought to improve program's functionality. The device does give you a clumsy and sketchy feel of use with note taking. With this device you cannot even get close to the ease of taking notes on a paper. I even doubted my ability to use the device after seeing many complimentary reviews which also caused me to purchase it in the first place. But if my experience with this device is correct, it is extremely ironic to name a device Samsung "NOTE" although one of the worst things it can do is providing a comfortable and effective note taking experience.Maybe I am expecting too much from this tablet with current technology. And maybe I could not make myself cognizant enough of its features. So I am open to any suggestions about using Note app more efficiently. Or I'd love to learn if the Note app is open to improvement in the short run or if there are other apps that can make better use of the potential of the tablet.I looked for other android applications for note taking and text conversion to give a last chance to this device but couldn't find a better one than MyScript Notes Mobile which I wasn't able download and install on this one.I am very disappointed with the incompetence of the software on this device for converting handwriting to text. I am still wondering if I missed a mark. I would give 2 stars if I only took the note-taking features of the device into consideration.So I will return it unless it surprises me soon for good.Nevertheless this tablet still might be a good choice for the ones who want to take note only in handwriting -without conversion- and the ones who looks mainly for drawing and photoshop features.I think it will be wise to wait for Microsoft Surface Pro, Lenovo Thinkpad 2 and especially for Ipad 4. There are news that Apple applied last year to take patent for a note-taking technology it developed. I am especially hopeful of coming iPad's competency of note-taking if it comes with it considering its retina display and its success in creating user-friendly and convenient apps. From the rumors I understand that they are trying to create a writing experience similar to one in note taking on paper. I am sure that all three will do a better job in this respect than Samsung Note 10.1.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I take my Samsung Galaxy Note EVERYWHERE! You can view absolutely everything you can on a cell phone plus you've got a bigger camera you can take pictures with. Plus the streaming is excellent. I love to use my Pandora on it because the speakers are on the front and broadcast beautifully. The only draw back, just as with a cell phone, it doesn't show you your junk email box, in which most of my emails go into, including the one's I've subscribed to. All in all, I'm super happy with my Samsung Galaxy Note 10.1 and am glad I purchased it through Amazon instead of a store, which would've cost more.

Reviews.Title: Sent back.
Reviews.Author: Michele Winter "love shopping online"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this Samsung Note for myself because the first one I purchase was the wrong style. I actually did not like this one and I had a lot of problems with it recognizing my touch. There may be something wrong with the LCD screen. Amazon sent UPS to my home they  picked it up and within 5 days already have the money back in my account. This is why I always shop with Amazon!

Reviews.Title: The best thing I've ever bought myself
Reviews.Author: Brittany
Reviews.Content: I've had this for over a year so I'm late reviewing it, but I haven't had any problems with it! It's great!

Reviews.Title: An extremely awesome and capable value
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I'm 68 years old and NOTa computer guru but I do a lot of traveling and wanted a 'computer' that I could take on trips that was compact , rugged and lightweight. This fits the bill and much more. It is fast, has outstanding HD, takes great pictures/movies and is my computer while I'm away. I am amazed at how easy this is to operate and the quantity of aps available. I use it with Amazon prime to obtain books and movies and even Skype now has a operating setup for android. There is nothing I can think of that this can't do.  There are more expensive units out there but dollar for dollar this unit is a best if not great buy.

Reviews.Title: Lots of Fun
Reviews.Author: Brian Lewis "Big B"
Reviews.Content: I think this was a good choice for my family.  My daughter loves playing with the pen on the device, otherwise it doesn't get used a lot.  Connectivity to our WiFi is great.  Videos look crisp.  Battery lasts forever when device isn't being used.  Only problem is that when plugged in, something happens when it goes to sleep.  It doesn't always want to wake up right away.  The first couple of times this happened I did a forced restart.  But I've noticed that if this happens, if I just wait, it will correct itself within a minute or two.

Reviews.Title: Good value for the price
Reviews.Author: NJ Bukwurm
Reviews.Content: This tablet does a nice job as a backup to another computer.  I really like it for traveling.  The operating system is quite comfortable for anyone using a Droid phone.

Reviews.Title: Galaxy Note 10.1
Reviews.Author: Solomon K Gichuki
Reviews.Content: All gaga about this tablet and still on the learning curve, but it must be said that it is a solid and beautifully designed device.Pros:A wonderfully designed virtual keyboardBright and aesthetically tasteful displayRapid switch between apps and pagesSmartstayWell, I may as well ramble on ad nauseum, but it does have its cons though:Limited android ecosystemThat's just about it. Ipad promptly dispatched to my grateful mom

Reviews.Title: THE BEST TABLET SO FAR
Reviews.Author: Jorge Venezuela
Reviews.Content: MY WIFE BOUGHT THIS TAB FOR ME AND I LOVE IT, SINCE ITS ANDROID IT HAS A LOT OF GAMES YOU CAN DOWNLOAD. YOU CAN EITHER TYPE WITH IT OR USE THE PEN TO WRITE; EMAILS, WEB PAGES, NOTES, CALENDAR REMINDERS, DRAW.. ETC. TOP NOTCH, BEST TECH SO FAR.

Reviews.Title: great gift
Reviews.Author: Frank L. Maynard
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my wife and she is enjoying it immensely.  Some of the android icons are a bit confusing, but all in all the tablet is allowing her to do a great number of things on the web.

Reviews.Title: it is the best thing I have ever bought.
Reviews.Author: Kristen Bailey
Reviews.Content: I use it every day for various reasons. Playing games, taking notes, studying for school, using the internet. Everything. I couldn't have asked for more from a device. I recommend it to everyone. You will find a use for it, I am sure of it.

Reviews.Title: It's amazing!
Reviews.Author: Gabriela Barreno
Reviews.Content: I love it, it's perfect and exactly what I was expecting.I have never use android, but now I met it, I love it.

Reviews.Title: Note 10.1 32gb  Okay but. . .
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I only give this 4 out of 5 stars as I believe that there is NOTHING in the world that's perfect.There were a couple of items that disapointed me.1. The device relies on a single, fragile appearing, connector for I/O to a computer or other device via a cable that is too short.2. Charging the battery is only by way of this one connector. I cannot believe that a micro USB B connector couldn't have been placed on the upper edge with the power on/off and volume control. Would have been nice to have a USB connector for an external DVD or HDD/SD drive.On the plus side. . .1. The screen display is beautiful2. The processor seems fast and log on to wi-fi is quick. Bluetooth is quick to start as well.3. The touch screen is far superior to the Dell 1090 which this replaces. Avoid Dell.4. Battery life is good which I attribute greatly to having the SD drive instead of a standard HDD.5. I wanted a tablet but didn't want an Apple.6. I bought the Wi-Fi only rather than 3G/4G since I didn't want to be locked into a cell phone carrier and incur the extra monthly charges to use it.  There's lots of places like Public Libraries, Interstate highway reststops,Starbucks, McDonalds and Panera/St. Louis Bread  that have free Wi-Fi.7. Android networking to my LAN is somewhat less that intuitive.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for any student
Reviews.Author: Lisa Finefrock
Reviews.Content: By far the best pad of any kind for a student. I use it to take all class notes including and especially math. I love the dropbox which allows me to see and print my documents on my laptop.

Reviews.Title: My first tablet
Reviews.Author: Steven Pham Nguyen
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my family to share. Parents are not tech savvy but are enjoying the product as they learn how to use it. Haven't used it extensively but so far it does what I need it to.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Joseph Learn
Reviews.Content: I was going to go with a nexus 10, but they were sold out everywhere. as this was a gift for my mom I did a lot of research on the net and decided that this was my next best option. I was not disappointed at all.as with most tablets, it came with a ton of pre loaded apps. 90 % of which will never be used, and you can't uninstall pre loaded apps < I hate bloat ware >.This tablet is amazing, It is very fast, and the touch screen is very responsive.The built in speakers sound very nice, I bought her external speakers for it, and she has yet to use them on it due to not needing them.The resolution is crisp, and even though its not as good as the nexus's resolution, I can't tell the difference and I am a tech nerd who pays close attention to that stuff.Movies play well, music plays well, books look very nice on it.The weight of the device is good, and the device has a heavy duty feel to it, but it is light weight at the same time.The only thing that I found annoying about it, was the fact that I can't get flash to work on it < Tried installing an older version adobe flash 11.1 but it was a no go > but this is not the tablets fault, as flash no longer supports droid devices < Thanks microsoft >.Overall, this tablet rocks, I am highly satisfied with it, and so is my mom.By the way, the only reason I was trying to put flash on it was so my mom could play her pogo on it, and pogo does have a droid app so she can play, but the amount of mobile games they have added to it is minimal < 5 games total I think > but she still enjoys the 5 games that are on it. and with it being a driod, she has enough of the market place apps to keep her busy enough.Also, this tablet didn't come with any virus protection < which shocked me because it had about 50 pre loaded apps on it > so when you get it, do yourself a favor and make sure you install one first thing. I would recommend lookout.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: stardust
Reviews.Content: I bought the white note for my daughter and she simply loves it! It's so slim, light and beautiful!The only thing we got to do with the note is play games and write/color on the s-note. It's fun and entertaining. Speakers are good and the sound is crisp and loud enough.The s-pen is great and very sensitive! Very easy to pull from the body and put it back.One disappointment was that the note doesn't support Flash Player and I don't know what else we can use for online games, videos etc.The charging cable is very short and you have to literary sit beside the outlet if you want to use the note while charging.

Reviews.Title: Love this think
Reviews.Author: Kirtwell
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter for her graduation present last year.  She uses this notebook everyday and if she leaves it out....my son and I will grab it.  Great product...very addicting

Reviews.Title: `A Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: Alexandros M. Collie "bah techie"
Reviews.Content: This tablet was brought for my mother and now she is enjoying the use of it. It is fast and easy to navigate. An add plus is that the tablet comes configures to backup your precious photographs to dropbox once the tablet is linked to your dropbox account. For the most part the user interface is intuitive. My mum it loving it, therefore it was a good buy.

Reviews.Title: Not happy
Reviews.Author: Donald E. Kremer
Reviews.Content: Hard to use. Can not play some PBS programs (Frontline)  Frustrated enough that I put the device away for awhile.  I will try to find help.

Reviews.Title: excelent
Reviews.Author: Diego Chacon Rojas
Reviews.Content: Excelent tablet. Awesome batery lifeand screen resolution. Light. Only waiting for android 4.4 kitkat from samsung. Run a older android.

Reviews.Title: after 3 months battery won't charge when the tablet is on
Reviews.Author: xiaobin zhuang
Reviews.Content: I got the tablet on Feb 14th and find the return button doesn't work if i don't press it a little above it.  I Thougt I was too sensitive  and I can try to live with the little problem since i threw the plastic protectors away .During the 3 months I have to press return button twice almost every time I need to  return to the previous page. It's the pain in the butt!3 days ago I noticed an "X" on the battery when i charge it when the tablet on and looks like it's not charging at all.  So I tried different adopters,  same thing.  I turned it off and charged it a whole night. the next day i turned it on, only 80percent charged. i even bought two new cables none of them changes the fact of the problem.Only 3months the battery quit already?  No what I do?anyone has the same issue?

Reviews.Title: Great tablet, needs better non-geek instructions
Reviews.Author: Debra E Lincicum
Reviews.Content: I had a 7 tablet and like the bigger size. I only wish that instructions for these items were easier for non geeks.

Reviews.Title: Does everything
Reviews.Author: iluvmirroredfurniture
Reviews.Content: Was easy to use.  Bold bright display. Sync's with other Samsung devices easily. Long battery life.  Could not be happier! Love it!!!

Reviews.Title: good tablet
Reviews.Author: Le Brunjade
Reviews.Content: This is a good tablet, the product Samsung is more open than the "world Apple" , but the reactivity when you write something is weak.We need to wait time before beginning to write or to connect at my wifi, router, don't give an  effective performance.

Reviews.Title: Galaxy Note 10.1
Reviews.Author: LLOYD
Reviews.Content: This is the most exciting thing I have ordered for myself inalong time but it works a lot like my Samsung blaze phone. I have enjoyed it very much and at the price I did not have to rob a bank

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: eva crawford
Reviews.Content: love this tablet. the size,picture and everything. a little hard to find case for but overall the tablet is great. worth the money

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: eva crawford
Reviews.Content: love this tablet. the size,picture and everything. a little hard to find case for but overall the tablet is great. worth the money

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Linda Elliott
Reviews.Content: It came when it was supposed to, and it is exactly what I wanted!  The price is great, too!  :)

Reviews.Title: Great tablet, works great!
Reviews.Author: Jason Goldman "Jester Jay"
Reviews.Content: I wanted a tablet to use for both onstage (displaying setlists, etc) and at home (reading email, writing articles). The Galaxy Note 10.1 has exceeded my expectations. A key factor has turned out to be the S-Pen. The handwriting recognition is not perfect (in fact it's pretty mediocre at grammatical symbols), but it much easier to write on than I ever would have guessed.

Reviews.Title: Good price
Reviews.Author: jungwoo
Reviews.Content: I like the product. The price is very reasonable. I am using this for planning, taking notes, etc and it works perfectly fine.

Reviews.Title: Galaxy Note 10.1
Reviews.Author: David Powell
Reviews.Content: I am still getting used to it but it will serve my propose of use.  This was and is a good buy.

Reviews.Title: Working perfect!
Reviews.Author: Alvaro
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife's niece and they are very happy with the Galaxy note. It came in perfect condition and is still working wonderfully.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: happygram
Reviews.Content: Fast, fun and just what I wanted and expected. I have the Samsung Galaxy phone too and they are so compatible. Very happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great gift for my wife
Reviews.Author: Shanell Johnson
Reviews.Content: I bought this last minute for my wife's birthday and it shipped really quick.Before I tell you more about the product just know I am more of an appleperson and so I was first looking at Ipads. One of the main reasons why Ipicked this Note is you don't have to pay to add on extras. I was able todownload a lot of apps and games for free. It navigates very well betweenthe different screens. My wife loves that the volume isn't low its pretty loud.We were having a tough time finding a cover in the stores for it but onlinenot an issue. The price is right. This is also like a galaxy phone keep that in mindjust a bigger screen etc.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Note 10.1 (32GB, Deep Grey) is very good product with a so lower price to me . I like the product.
Reviews.Author: HXX
Reviews.Content: very good!  Samsung Galaxy Note 10.1 (32GB, Deep Grey) is very good product with a so lower price to me . I like the product.

Reviews.Title: Note 10.1
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "w7hd"
Reviews.Content: So good I had to buy one for my wife after she used mine.  So we are both proud owners and use them several hours daily for browsing, reading, whatever!  They even take nice photos!

Reviews.Title: you will love it
Reviews.Author: ursa1
Reviews.Content: After hours of shoooing and tablet research lots of memory of the $  I was concerned about the display but it's great

Reviews.Title: The perfect fit!
Reviews.Author: Gregg
Reviews.Content: It was easy to put on, and protects the tablet perfectly!  A good buy and I recommend this to everyone.

Reviews.Title: Bad battery
Reviews.Author: JD
Reviews.Content: Battery won't charge plugged in for 10 hours and it comes up 30% more and I am one day past return day . Bummer JD

Reviews.Title: Good Tablet
Reviews.Author: Hiren Parmar
Reviews.Content: It is a very nice tablet from Samsung. I find it better than iPad. It comes with a Stylus which does more than a Stylus. Handwriting Recognition works well with the ones who find it difficult to type on Tablet.

Reviews.Title: Love the product
Reviews.Author: Bruce Campbell
Reviews.Content: I have been enjoying my new tablet! it is easy to set up and download apps. love the picture and video capabilities

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: DAVID BODDEN
Reviews.Content: Works awesome. I really like that it navigates very fast. It has a really big and bright screen. I also love the fast shipping.

Reviews.Title: Galaxy Note 10.1
Reviews.Author: Nel L.
Reviews.Content: I have enjoyed learning how to use this tablet.  I'm sure that there are things I haven't learned about it as yet.  The only thing that bothers me is the Facebook app that doesn't show all my friends postings. I am glad I didn't listen to my friends who said it would be too big.  I love the 10.1 size.

Reviews.Title: Nice.
Reviews.Author: Judy Snyder
Reviews.Content: works great.  Great for school.  had to get folder and screen protector, but other than that, it was readuy to go.

Reviews.Title: Love it so much!
Reviews.Author: Lisa
Reviews.Content: I've satisfied with it every since I layed eyes on it. I also, got it for a grest prices as well.

Reviews.Title: excellent product!
Reviews.Author: nancyolima
Reviews.Content: the best tablet we ever had and for the price it was a bargain! I totally love it and recommended it.

Reviews.Title: first tablet
Reviews.Author: simon fielder
Reviews.Content: Got this for the size and price, cant complain about anything yet. Internet wifi works great , loaded Skype on it and works well.

Reviews.Title: The Best tablet I have ever used.
Reviews.Author: vadougie "Doug P."
Reviews.Content: When I started with android I bought a lower priced tablet and had troubles with it.  I decided to get one of the top of the line tablets so I chose this Samsung Galaxy Note 10.1.  I have worked with electronics and communications my whole life , going back to my Army days.  This tablet is a fine piece of electronic engineering and the functions seem to work flawlessly.  This is my first Samsung product , but it won't be my last.  The one thing that I see that could be better is when in the case designed for it , it puts pressure on the power connector .  I wish it was located so as it didn't do that.  One must take care of the power cord connection into the tablet.  The S pen is an amazing feature and has many capabilities.  This is one serious tablet, but also a lot of fun.

Reviews.Title: Samsung tab
Reviews.Author: E. Rachelle Daugherty "shewhowantstorun"
Reviews.Content: Item as expected..I use this much more than my laptop (the size is great!) The graphics are very clear and bright.

Reviews.Title: Friendly work, school, and fun tablet
Reviews.Author: Cailin Noble
Reviews.Content: Love it!  I am still learning the Android system, but it works great.  It works smoothly and works great for work and school.  I would recommend installing google drive and use that to work through the office products.  Not a big fan of the Polaris office that comes on it.  It is very light weight and fits in most bags with ease.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet!
Reviews.Author: Adhern
Reviews.Content: Bought this tablet for my wife and loved it. She had previously own a generic tablet from big lots and did not like it but she loves this one takes it everywhere she goes.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet!
Reviews.Author: Oscar Ballestero
Reviews.Content: Bought it as a gift for my wife and she is currently loving it.  Easy to use, attractive to the eye, great choice for geeks as well as for tablet noobs!  Delivered in time and flawlessly.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Tina Renea hubbard
Reviews.Content: I ordered this product to help me through nursing school.  It does not support office 365 and does not support my online homework.....so I can't do my online classes with it. But, it is an amazing product and I am keeping it, even though a lot of apps that are supported on my note 3 do not work on this tablet.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic!
Reviews.Author: S. M. Brown
Reviews.Content: I have nothing techie to add since I'm a casual user but I will say that I'm very happy with my tablet.  My favorite app thus far has been Synctunes so that I can get my iTunes music from my PC to my tablet.  Worked flawlessly.  I love the s-pen functionality and would recommend the Galaxy Note to anyone.  Not one problem with this refurbished unit.

Reviews.Title: Best Android tablet I have owned
Reviews.Author: Mostly Geek
Reviews.Content: I bought this before I went on Vacation last summer, So I have now owned it for about 9 months.  I have owned 2 other android tablets before this and this 1 is by far the best.  The digitizer is pretty good, but I actually prefer the Surface pro digitizer but that is more of an ultrabook then a tablet.  Now that the price has dropped for this device since the new model has been released this tablet is a great deal.

Reviews.Title: Super Great tablet
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: First off I recommend this tablet. Still playing around with it. Going to be using it for drawing. The digitizer is fantastic. The tablet impressed me so much. Its like having a laptop with the Android OS. I will be buying another one for backup. A newer one and this one will be my backup. For artist Photoshop Touch & Sketchbook Pro on this tablet and you are good to go. And that is great because it comes with Photoshop Touch as part of its selling point. Drawing is smooth and responsive. All other apps respond really quick. I have nothing to complain about.

Reviews.Title: best thing I bought for myself
Reviews.Author: ACUTABOVE
Reviews.Content: I didn't know what to get at first Samsung or apple .But after talking to people from both sides decided on Samsung. I added another 32mg have plenty of space. Look forward to learning about all of its features. would recommend to anyone.

Reviews.Title: It is happy!
