Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Very convenient and clever friend! ) ) ) ) I am happy!Everything in it is convenient and beautiful, long holds charging.

Reviews.Title: Love!
Reviews.Author: Jessica Bergren
Reviews.Content: I love this tablet. I like to use it for reading and for art. I love the multi-window functionality and that there are a lot of apps maximized for the screen size. Very useful, but it can get heavy after reading for a long time, so you might need a lap pillow. :)

Reviews.Title: I love my tablet!
Reviews.Author: Lisha
Reviews.Content: Use it every day for so many things. It's been life changing... :)Knocks the socks off any iPad or Apple product

Reviews.Title: My Best buy!
Reviews.Author: Adaora Joy Ezeh
Reviews.Content: Beautiful mobile machine. Excellent apps, durable and worth every cent. The pride of all my purchases. Thanks Samsung! Prestigious and classy!!!

Reviews.Title: blows ipad out!
Reviews.Author: David McClarren
Reviews.Content: amazing product. resolution has a little to be desired but overall a superior tablet to just about any other model out there. uses dual core processor but note that in my personal experience it actually takes less time to do tasks as compared to samsungs new quad core systems. this may be due to less bloatware on this system. a great buy.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Adela
Reviews.Content: Useful and modern tablet. I had the previous version, so I knew it would be good. One of my best shop.

Reviews.Title: good value.. really fast too.
Reviews.Author: Roger Grissom
Reviews.Content: I bought 1 unit as a gift for my Wife and liked it enough to buy another for myself. The only negative is most programs reside in main memory, not on the SD card.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: F. Lawrence
Reviews.Content: This tablet does everything I could want and more.  If you are an Android fan like me, the Samsung Galaxy Note series is where you should be looking.  The 10.1 inch size is perfect for me.  The speed, features, and capabilites make this a tablet ideal for both business, research, and fun.I'm still getting used to the stylus and how to make the best use of it.  My previous Android devices did not have a stylus so I have to remind my self to use it.  It is just to easy to keep using my fingers as before.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Jeff May
Reviews.Content: Excellent product. Shipping was as promised. My wife loves her new anniversary gift.. She uses it to highlight magazines that she downloads as well as many other things.Thank you

Reviews.Title: Samsung
Reviews.Author: cindy stearns
Reviews.Content: Because I Love the samsung products are great.my phone and tvs are all samsung. Its easy to use as well.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: A. Mccradic
Reviews.Content: I love my tablet it is versatile, compatible and very easy to use.  I can use it as a remote control for my new Samsung Smart Tv

Reviews.Title: Note for wife
Reviews.Author: Wynn Nugent
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my wife so we could communicate while I was away from home. She was completely against it at first and thought it was a waste of money. Now, it is all she uses. Easy Android operating system with excellent functionality.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME
Reviews.Author: ecc "book pirate"
Reviews.Content: Love the galaxy note! I used it every day, and I wasn't really sold on being a tablet person. The features are incredible, and the S pen is a nice option as well. Love that I can add 64GB with a micro SD card. This tablet has it all, but I do wish that maybe I would have gotten a tablet that runs Windows 8. However, I couldn't be more pleased with the Galaxy Note.

Reviews.Title: The perfect gift
Reviews.Author: Andrea Thomas
Reviews.Content: I purchase this as a gift for my sister. She loves it, and its all that she ever talks about. I also purchased the screen protector.

Reviews.Title: I loved my new tablet
Reviews.Author: renee davis
Reviews.Content: I loved it!!impressed with the speed and set up. I still have a lot to learn.  I was stumped about the "pen".  I had not noticed it in the package and was about to return the tablet when I noticed what looked like an antennae.  Turned out the pen was attached onto the tablet. I was surely glad to discovered this.

Reviews.Title: I love this tablet, but there's always cons.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "D.S."
Reviews.Content: I truly love this tablet, I really do. I have a Galaxy S3, so I immediately decided a Samsung tablet would be what I purchased. I would not, however, pay $400 for it (I bought it on a lightning deal for around $340) for a few reasons.No home button - I didn't think this would bother me. Turns out, it does, and I'm glad it's something they included with the 2014 edition. If the screen goes dead, you have to press the power button, and since I have a lock on my tablet, I have to go through that again. If an app freezes (which happens occasionally, but not often) you have to use the power button instead of having a button to return you to the home screen. This is my biggest issue with this tablet.S-Pen is lacking a feature I would have liked, which would be to turn off sensing my fingers/hands/skin. I bought this tablet for note taking and drawing, but it's almost a chore because the screen constantly skips around when I try to use the S-Pen with it because my hand or wrist rests on the tablet as well. It's annoying. I know some app's allow you to turn off the sensitivity, but I shouldn't have to pay $4.99 for something to do what my tablet should.No swype. I know, I know. It's a tablet. But sometimes I just want to use swype when holding the tablet vertically. Swype isn't installed, and you have to buy the app. Doesn't work for me.Those are pretty much my only flaws. I do love this tablet and I don't regret purchasing it at all.

Reviews.Title: Invaluable Tool
Reviews.Author: Dawn Michelle
Reviews.Content: I have had my Note 10.1 for a year and I absolutely love it.  I take it with me everywhere.  I use it for note taking at all types of meetings and personal uses.  I use it to check out and read books with the kindle app.  I use the kno and cengage apps for textbooks (I am an instructor).  Research, gaming, remote for my TV.  I love having two applications open side by side.The only problem I have had with it was a few weeks after I got it, the update came out and it would not work right.  I called tech support at Samsung (not the most helpful), but I had to reset it to factory settings and start over.I recommend this tablet to everyone who asks.  I do not see it advertised much anymore, which concerns me.  I don't want it to become obsolete!I do have an Ipad 2 for work and both are similar in features and settings.  But my Ipad 2 does not have a stylus compartment built in or allow me to have two open windows side by side.  So I still use my personal Samsung Note 10.1 for meetings etc.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Note
Reviews.Author: Emmy
Reviews.Content: Wonderful tablet. Arrived with no issues and in perfect condition. My husband really likes the portability and the ease of use.

Reviews.Title: Samsung does it again!
Reviews.Author: Sondra M. Haynes
Reviews.Content: Very good product, fun to use and quality made. I highly recommend Samsung because it sells for less but will hold up against any other Tablet or note being sold today.

Reviews.Title: Swiss Army Knife of Tablets
Reviews.Author: Daniel Dickey "Webtrician"
Reviews.Content: I really like the screen size. The S pen and place for a micro SD card are great features. Truly a swiss army knife of tablets which can pretty much do it all. The only complaint I would have is that in dim light the screen dims almost too much. But you can still read it and can choose to set the brightness manually instead of automatic. Great product!

Reviews.Title: My Wife loves this tablet
Reviews.Author: Randy Craig
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife for Christmas.  The screen is big, bright, and much easy for her to see than a smart phone screen.  Being able to back up files on a MicroSD card and do our budgets with the included MS Office compatible software were big benefits.  She's really enjoyed it so far and that's all that matters to me.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: Albright21
Reviews.Content: This tablet is pretty dang sweet! I have had no problems with it and it has been almost a year! the pen is very precise and has many different functions.

Reviews.Title: cyber monday deal
Reviews.Author: jorge roman
Reviews.Content: really good for the price. i bought it for 330 $ that's 200 $ less than the regular price. works perfect

Reviews.Title: Better than the iPad
Reviews.Author: Eugene Savage
Reviews.Content: To me this tablet work much better than the last 2 iPads and cost significantly less, but well worth the money. Functionality is outstanding.

Reviews.Title: First Tablet
Reviews.Author: Manny
Reviews.Content: Not a big tech guy so I will keep simple so far love it was easy to set up my email accounts. Installed a couple games no problems so fsr battery life is good

Reviews.Title: Happy, happy...
Reviews.Author: Erica Swanson
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with my new tablet, and I am still discovering new things I can do with it.  My one concern is battery life.  Sometimes apps do not close even though I think they have,  such as the video player and camera and take away from the battery time.  I just have to remember to close them manually, but it seems like it should be automatic.

Reviews.Title: Very Cool!!
Reviews.Author: STRI
Reviews.Content: Purchased after extensive review and research on tablets.  Teen daughter could not be more thrilled. She loves art and drawing, and has been pleased with this tablet.  She is a hard person to shop for and we hit a homerun with this item!!:)  Thanks also for excellent delivery time and service!!

Reviews.Title: awesome!
Reviews.Author: wan ly elias reategui
Reviews.Content: even when it doesn't have the hardware of this next generation, 2 gb of ram is enough and all goes fast and neat.

Reviews.Title: Best tablet available
Reviews.Author: Sirus
Reviews.Content: I bought this for school and have not regretted my decision in the least.  I always thought I would have no need for a tablet...until I got this one.  Now I can't imagine going without it.Taking notes and highlighting material in digital textbooks is so easy with the S-pen.  Outside of school, it is powerful enough to run whatever apps you can throw at it.  I use it at work as a compliment to my computer.It's fast, has lots of space, and does more than I need it to.  A great tablet all around.

Reviews.Title: Very Cool!!
Reviews.Author: STRI
Reviews.Content: Purchased after extensive review and research on tablets.  Teen daughter could not be more thrilled. She loves art and drawing, and has been pleased with this tablet.  She is a hard person to shop for and we hit a homerun with this item!!:)  Thanks also for excellent delivery time and service!!

Reviews.Title: awesome!
Reviews.Author: wan ly elias reategui
Reviews.Content: even when it doesn't have the hardware of this next generation, 2 gb of ram is enough and all goes fast and neat.

Reviews.Title: Best tablet available
Reviews.Author: Sirus
Reviews.Content: I bought this for school and have not regretted my decision in the least.  I always thought I would have no need for a tablet...until I got this one.  Now I can't imagine going without it.Taking notes and highlighting material in digital textbooks is so easy with the S-pen.  Outside of school, it is powerful enough to run whatever apps you can throw at it.  I use it at work as a compliment to my computer.It's fast, has lots of space, and does more than I need it to.  A great tablet all around.

Reviews.Title: awsome
Reviews.Author: d.w. barton
Reviews.Content: Love it does everything I got it for peel app is the best not controlls tv and other electronics perfectly.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: td
Reviews.Content: I love my tablet. I use it every day. It is great for work or personal use. I love using the s-pen features

Reviews.Title: Very Fast and Big screen!
Reviews.Author: MANISHA  R PATEL
Reviews.Content: This tablet works very fast. I have an IPAD mini but I think Samsung note 10.1 works faster than Apple. Also I like the big screen.

Reviews.Title: Note
Reviews.Author: Balint Marius Teodor
Reviews.Content: Hello . I don't recive the pen , must to paste display after 5 days  and it has a big period of time when charge  .

Reviews.Title: One of the best
Reviews.Author: Wissam Toubia
Reviews.Content: Great design, very fluid interface, screen size is more than enough... I love the multi window functionality and the power of the CPU

Reviews.Title: I ordered two of these and this third order was in error and thus returned for credit which was very easy to do.
Reviews.Author: frenchie
Reviews.Content: I appreciate your quick easy response to achieve this return!  The return label provided via email and clearly written steps as to procedure is wonderful!  Thank You !!

Reviews.Title: best thing in the world to have when convalescing
Reviews.Author: Joanne H.
Reviews.Content: Stuck in bed for a month following surgery, terrifically handy. I am sure I am not using all the features, but it makes me very happy.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I wanted
Reviews.Author: Summer M Nicks
Reviews.Content: I am a full time engineering student, I did my research for a tablet to replace my 40 lb backpack.  I already have a bad back so I needed something to take notes on that would be fast and compatible with a lot of equations as well as read my books on.  I also have terrible handwriting so the fact that I can write an equation and it will put it into text making it readable later is great, I can also search the equation online at the touch of a button.  For me it is fantastic I have always had a windows computer and an Iphone so I was a little leery of learning android but it is easy to figure out and so far has worker better than I could have imagined.  Also its battery life is amazing, I can be at school or work and use it heavily all day and just charge it at night.

Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: Zendteyah Musson
Reviews.Content: Unfortunately, I did not realize that this was not the 2014 version.Otherwise than that its a good product.I would recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: First Time User
Reviews.Author: K M I "K. Irvine"
Reviews.Content: Samsung Galaxy Note 10.1 was recommended to me.  I haven't used one before this.  I would recommend it too!Great value.

Reviews.Title: Pretty cool tablet
Reviews.Author: KO
Reviews.Content: I will admit I am an avid Mac user and would never give up my Mac computer for a PC. For iPads, the major issues I have is the inability to adjust many settings readily and inability to run more than one program at a time. The Galaxy Note doesn't have this issue. I find it easy to use and set up. In addition, it has a micro-SIM drive to increase the memory of the device, which is a definite plus. The apps are not quite up to speed with android and iPhone apps (especially fb app, which currently sucks and lack of a true iTunes app), but I reckon this issue will resolve in time. The resolution of the screen is not as good as the newest iPads, but this is a minor issue for me. If you are frustrated with limits of an iPad, this is the tablet for you!

Reviews.Title: It will take the place of my heavy laptop
Reviews.Author: Harry Shaw
Reviews.Content: It will take the place of my heavy laptop. The screen is a perfect size. I'll be able to show customers their products.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Note 10.1
Reviews.Author: Leonard Hunkins
Reviews.Content: This is our first tablet so there has been a bit of a learning curve.  Everything has worked great.  Very crisp and clear screen.  Boots up very fast and applications load fast too.  A lot more to explore.  Great product.

Reviews.Title: As good as advertised
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: I'm a pretty techy guy, and I did my research for months before buying I tablet. I was considering the Galaxy Note 10.1, the Google Nexus 10, and to a lesser extent the iPad and Kindle Fire HD. Finally decided on this one, and purchased after a nice sale on Black Friday that saved me $170 off the list price at that time. I am thrilled with the purchase. It arrived quickly and with simple packaging, It is sleek, fast, and capable. I'm still trying to master all the functions with the S-pen (I've always been a swipe-of-the-finger type of guy). I've got to devote more time to that, but it's not a knock against the machine. It looks beautiful and can handle anything I throw at it so far. I'd strongly recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Solid performance
Reviews.Author: Brian Terrell
Reviews.Content: I have a hard time seeing a tablet as anything more than a toy. I had a 1st gen. iPad that was a lot of fun and heaviky considered getting a new one. But with upgrading to a Galaxy S4 phone a month earlier, I decided to shop the 10.1. Really glad I did.The apps I use most frequently were in the Play Store and I greatly prefer the wide screen format for watching videos/movies. Holding up very nicely after a month of steady (but not very heavy, to be honest) use.

Reviews.Title: Excellent tablet
Reviews.Author: Bev Elias
Reviews.Content: Love it when it connects to WIFI very fast compared to my other tablet.  Very clear screen. I would recommend purchasing a cover for it.  Easier to hang on to it.

Reviews.Title: Very impressed!
Reviews.Author: Joel Miyamoto
Reviews.Content: I am currently a college student and have been looking for the perfect note taking tablet. I am currently very happy with my choice. The s note taking app is perfect because it allows me to handwrite, type my notes or even use it's handwriting recognition feature to jot down notes. Adding pictures to the notes is as simple as pushing an icon button in the top right hand corner.The s pen is comfortable and is obviously an extension of the tablet.The galaxy knows when the s pen leaves the tablet, giving you a notification and opening up a side bar full of apps they utilize the pen for quick note taking.It even knows when the pen is hovering over the screen.A tiny dot appears when hovering and when placed on top of icons, will give a description of the icons function. This little dot is also great for editing messages due to its precision.This tablet runs very smoothly and has access to the full droid app store. I absolutely love this tablet and can't wait for classes to start do I can start using it.

Reviews.Title: Wrong cable
Reviews.Author: Amanda Fenley
Reviews.Content: The tablet is great. The packaging was sent with the wrong charger, it had the charger for the phone, not the tablet. What a bummer on Christmas to open a gift that isn't charged and can't charge because it has the wrong charger. Luckily we had a friend that had a different Samsung tablet and we were able to borrow it. Bummed to have to buy a charger now when this one should be came with the correct charger.

Reviews.Title: Just like the samsung galaxy 4 phone, love it, easy to use basics
Reviews.Author: T. Wedman
Reviews.Content: I gave this a 4 star rating only bc I don't know how to work everything yet.  However, youtube is very helpful.  This is my first tablet. I recently switched from an iPhone to galaxy s4. I am very happy w all the camera options that are also offered on the tablet.  The battery lasts forever & its light.  I don't miss my iPhone at all, therefore, Im not missing out on the ipad.

Reviews.Title: I have been wanting this
Reviews.Author: Carol Owens
Reviews.Content: I have been bugging my husband for this tablet for long time and he got it for me for Christmas have been having fun getting my stuff on it  would recomend

Reviews.Title: Obsessed
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: LOVE this! I would love to have the 2014 edition, but I will make this one last for a long time.

Reviews.Title: easy and fun to use for non tech person
Reviews.Author: goldgodess
Reviews.Content: I have not stopped using my samsung galaxy 10 since I've gotten it I'm really enjoying the cool features especially talking to my email and it's typing away for me. I'm also enjoying watching Netflix, reading my emails on the 10 inch screen.I think you would like it too easy easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Good value for money.
Reviews.Author: Nadim Sakkaf
Reviews.Content: The item was perfectly good and looked new, although it was sold as refurbished. It was a gift and was well liked.

Reviews.Title: exactly what I wanted
Reviews.Author: Cheryl L. Hirner
Reviews.Content: The tablet is just the right size and very light.  It works great for surfing the internet and skyping with my grandkids which is everything I need

Reviews.Title: Simply superb on look and work too !!!
Reviews.Author: Ravin
Reviews.Content: It is elegant. Light weighted. Quick to start and flowing like fluid. Apps are good. Yes as I purchased on US Amazon and Going to use it in India some good movies and songs are not available. Hope these freebies could be transfered to my india acc. and i may be provided with freebies available in India / Asea pacific.Certainly good product and one may not hesitate to have it. JUST GO FOR IT

Reviews.Title: Excellent purchase
Reviews.Author: Val
Reviews.Content: Bought it as a birthday gift.  The person absolutely loved it.  The thing I thought was great was the company didn't supply a  "refurbished" warranty, but a "Rebirth" warranty and explained exadctly whay it meant.

Reviews.Title: Many Pros, A Couple Small Cons
Reviews.Author: Sharon Lee
Reviews.Content: Loving my galaxy note so far. Battery life is doing very well. I am using it for all my lesson plans and seating charts. The handwriting input is great once you adjust to it (took me about 5 or 10 minutes), and the translation to text is quite accurate in both cursive and print. You can use OneNote which I love, and you can create a shortcut to almost anything. You can also run several windows side by side or toggle between full screen windows easily, although the installed broswer does not shrink to run side by side (I installed chrome, which does). So far most things are quite intuitive.Two minor flaws: I wish there was an easier way to go back and edit typed text, I.e. a back arrow that does not backspace. Ifyou mess up, you have to click on the place with your finger or stylus, which gets you close, but with small text having that arrow woukd be nice soyou don't have to poke 4 times to get in the precise spot. The other is that I wish it was a bit easier to move around files, pages, books in s-note. It takes several clicks and was the one thing it took me quite awhile to figure out, but works like a charm once  you get it.Highly recommended!!

Reviews.Title: excellent tool for work or personal purposes.
Reviews.Author: Fernando A. Garcia Gomez
Reviews.Content: Simply GREAT. HANDY. WELL DESIGNED. EASY TO CARRY OUT EVERYWHERE DUE TO ITS LIGHT WEIGHT. QUICK PROCESSOR. JUST AN EXCELLENT EQUIPMENT.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet!!
Reviews.Author: C. Goolsby "Shoe Queen"
Reviews.Content: Bought this tablet during tax free weekend.  A great buy.  I use this tblet more than I use my laptop.  I can pull up a receipe to follow in the kitchen and it does not take up much space.  Love it.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Sonia Gamboa Alvarado "Sonilu"
Reviews.Content: I love it, I continue to discover new things about it, and everytime I have a complain, I find a way or app to solve it

Reviews.Title: Great tablet.
Reviews.Author: Eileen
Reviews.Content: This tablet is excellent.  The display is sharp and easy to read, and note taking with built-in stylus is extremely useful.

Reviews.Title: Best investment so far
Reviews.Author: Nameless
Reviews.Content: This product is amazing. I did manage to get it while it was on sale, but knowing how great it is - I would of bought it for full price too. Well worth the investment. I mainly got it for art. I got the Sketchbook Pro app for it, and together they work wonderful. Of course you can do everything else on it too since its a tablet. Again, it's worth it.

Reviews.Title: perfect!
Reviews.Author: Trung Nguyen
Reviews.Content: great! this product is an excellence tablet. I like it a lot... whole lot better than iPad.  just minor setup for 1st time user.

Reviews.Content: Fast, reliable. Lacks mobile carrier service. If you don't use the tablet to take notes, the pen feature is not used as often as one would like.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: s
Reviews.Content: this tablet is so cool has so many different features, loads quick also.  Samsung has made some seriously cool products very pleased with this one too

Reviews.Title: buy buy buy

Reviews.Title: Best tabloid yet
Reviews.Author: Adam

Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter to use to keep control of her class schedule. Anything Galaxy is awesome, but this was exactly what she needed. She sold her iPad to get this lol Needless to say she's very happy she did.

Reviews.Content: I wanted a quality tablet other than an I pad. It's a great unit. It arrived quickly and and has great features!

Reviews.Title: Good product!!

Reviews.Content: Bought this tablet about 10 months ago and its still very solid.I usually don't rush to write reviews but rather wait to see how the products do.Its a very good and productive device.I have not had a problem since purchase.I recommend it to any one interested in a tablet.

Reviews.Title: lovely samsung galaxy note 10.1
Reviews.Author: sholymoore
Reviews.Content: Beautiful product, apart from having all the features of a normal tablet, this product is really slim, has a flash and I can write on it. I had to drop my pen and paper, to start writing on this, it sure is a beautiful product. I definitley will recommend this to all my friends and all who care to show interest. Good job samsung!

Reviews.Title: so far I'm in love
Reviews.Author: Kari Garcia
Reviews.Content: I love taking notes on this!! I am an electrical engineering student and it has great functions so that my shapes and graphs are beautiful. The S-pen is super legit. I also enjoy tumblr on it.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely Love it
Reviews.Author: DavidB
Reviews.Content: I bought one of these about six months ago and just wish I had the time to master it.  I am sure that I have only used about 10% of its capacity.  I like everything about it.  Only improvement might be a faster charging time, but that is the only complaint.  Works really well.

Reviews.Title: overall good experience with this tablet
Reviews.Author: Andrew S.
Reviews.Content: First bought a used one, that one didn't work properly and was the wrong capacity. After getting a new one and sending the used one back, I can see that there were issues on the previous tablet that did not pop up on the new tablet. Love the features, the S Pen functionality, and is perfect for college. Will be doing a speech about this tablet at college next week. Only thing I am not too keen on was there was no built in Swype keyboard like my HTC phone, but I bought the app so that was fixable

Reviews.Title: Better than my computer
Reviews.Author: Jordan Dantas
Reviews.Content: First off, I would like to say that I got this for less than $300 by buying a refurbished model with an "Excellent" grade. There was literally no marks, no smudges, nothing when I got it. I can't stress how good of a deal this was.Second, I am incredibly impressed by how fast and easy this thing is. My computer has a slower processor it seems and it cost me $600! The note taking system is really awesome, espceially for college kids. You can go to lecture and take notes using many different styles. You can take pictures and add them to the page, all the while recording the lecture in the background.This tablet is the best investment I've ever made!

Reviews.Title: love it!
Reviews.Author: Mavis Hill
Reviews.Content: Love this tablet way better than an ipad! Wish I had gotten one earlier! Do not own an ipad but have used a friend.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Thirteen12
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this tablet to all teachers and students.  Great for note-taking and organizing your work. I would recommend

Reviews.Title: Nice tablet
Reviews.Author: John E
Reviews.Content: bought this for my wife to replace a tablet that broke while overseas.  My wife is still learning to use this tablet, but she thinks it is better than her previous ASUS.

Reviews.Title: Galaxy Forever!
Reviews.Author: Bob Loblaw
Reviews.Content: I have loved my Note 10.1 since we got it.  I actually had no experience with the android platform, but the software was so intuitive that it made learning the nuiances very easy and fun.The things I like the most:-File browser so you can organize your files and folders on your tablet-Stylus that is extremely functional weather writing notes or selecting hyperlinks that my nubby fingers can't select-32 GB internal space for only $50 bucks more, PLUS expansion slot for more!We have had an exceptional experience with this tablet so far.  We would definately recommend it!

Reviews.Title: note 10.1
Reviews.Author: Carl Anthony
Reviews.Content: A first class tablet - it is fast, smooth between apps, touch response and sensitivity are great. The S - pen is a joy to use. I love it!!!

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Note Rules the Day
Reviews.Author: Sully by the sea
Reviews.Content: Some features are difficult to use. Perhaps in time I'll figure them out and change rating to 5/5. Would recommend especially to people who are using a Samsung Android phone

Reviews.Title: awesome tablet
Reviews.Author: zebrawings
Reviews.Content: I love this tablet. it does EVERYTHING is super fast and has a nice display. Would recommend for anyone wanting to use for work and home

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: Bluebird
Reviews.Content: I have wanted a tablet of a long time.  The Galaxy Samsunt was highly recommended by a friend, and I found it on Amazon.  I am using it a lot, and really enjoying it. I also bought the leather case and the screen protector film-love them too. I recently ordered the stylus pen from Amazon also. Looking forward to when it arrives. This was aug 20, 2013 right after I bought it.Update Sept. 23, 2013.  I have learned more how to use it and love it even more. It is incredible.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: ahmed mohamed
Reviews.Content: great for students who need a tablet, very creative for art and other uses. dropped a couples of times with a good cover it's perfect.

Reviews.Title: samsung galaxy note 10.1
Reviews.Author: bill h
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with this tablet like the quick response when changing screen .It is a bit ovewhelming with amount of apps avail all in all very glad i chose samsung tablet after researching all other tablets available

Reviews.Title: Ho yes I love it.
Reviews.Author: kamolmas
Reviews.Content: I bought  it from Thailand  and I would like to buy onemore in USA anyone have idea it have thai program  or not

Reviews.Title: Samsung rocks!!!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I both this product to take notes. Samsung did it right!  The note taking feature is simply excellent!  I love this tablet.  THANK YOU Samsung for making such a wonderful piece of electronics.  I love it!

Reviews.Title: brought this for my older daughter
Reviews.Author: Mom in MD
Reviews.Content: I brought this one for my oldest daughter (24)and the smaller one for my youngest (11).  they both love it and use it all the time.My oldest daughter uses it for both work and pleasure.  My youngest loves it for the apps and never wants to put it down.  Pretty sturdy to

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: adam
Reviews.Content: I love the tablet. I do not need paper anymore when I leave the house! Also, it keeps my eyes happy with the 10.1 inch screen. The speakers are great, and the pen with s note makes this tablet better than the rest. My only gripe is that there are still a handful of my favorite websites with video content that is not compatible on my tablet but compatible on my android phone. Go figure that one out.

Reviews.Title: This makes life easier
Reviews.Author: harmhvac
Reviews.Content: Only dislike is where charging prot is located at bottom of notebook.Use for work and on run. Makes it much easier to keep track of files I have at officeS pen is a trip. works great.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: EJB
Reviews.Content: It does exactly as I expected it to.  Love it.  Would buy it again.  The wife and I both have one.

Reviews.Title: In love
Reviews.Author: T. Andrews-George
Reviews.Content: Had it for 2 days and so far so good.  Very happy with my purchase.  You will not be dissapointed.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Thomas II
Reviews.Content: I,ve done the research, and snatched one up before the raised the price on Memorial Day.  I've mainly got this tablet to do my sketching on and read magazines.  Im looking forward to finding other uses for this tablet, and reading my kindle books.  So make the purchase you won't be sorry.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME!!!!
Reviews.Author: Vikki
Reviews.Content: after much researching and trying to figure out with tablet i wanted, i am so glad i bought this one!....it took awhile to figure out how to use it but once i did, its very easy now.....the s pen is handy, but have to admit that i dont use it that often.....only bad thing i have to say about it is that i wished there was a full operations manual some where in the files so i can look things up if i have questions on how to use it.....the 'help' section is not very helpful and it doesnt cover simple 'how to...' instructions.......this is a very good product and i am happy with it!

Reviews.Title: laptop performance, tablet portability.
Reviews.Author: Michael F. Medina
Reviews.Content: I will start off by admitting that I got mine on a refurb deal that saved me $200.  I will also admit that I was hesitant of the purchase.  I was never a laptop person as I was uncomfortable with it on my lap while I watch the kids.This was kind of a desperation purchase as I needed something I could take outside and room to room as the kids roamed.  I looked at the ipad, galaxy 2 and the note.  My eldest daughter has the galaxy phone and I was always impressed by its performance. And knowing how I multi task my destop to the limit, I decided tge extra cas for the quad vore processor the note 10.1 has was the most likely to satisify.Satisify is a huge understatement.  This is a fabulous machine that even 4 mos later I keep finding new uses for.The processor hums along great with multiple browsers and apps running.  Switching between front and rear cameras is great on video skype one you figure out how to do it and the voice recognition software built in is outstanding.  I would easily pay full price for another of these when the time comes.A few hints.  By nature one of the first things I did was install firefox browser.  Dont bother, ff mobike is nowhere near as good as the desktop.  Get Dolphin browser and chrome, each has a few features thst make them almidt mandatory.Dolphin - as many discover,  android discontinued flash support.  If you play browser games use this.  The dolphin browser will support legacy flash plug-in that let you play browser flash games and online apps like espn fantasy football draft software.Chrome - Chrome has a great feature that magnifies smaller links and buttons.  This combined with the s pen almost eliminates sausage finger errors.

Reviews.Title: LOVE THIS TABLET
Reviews.Author: ggkitty
Reviews.Content: I love this tablet.  I got the 32GB Deep Grey one.  The battery life is really great on this.I'm assuming most people get this because of the pen, if you aren't I would advise you to get the galaxy tab 2 10.1 inch.  It's pretty much the same tablet from what I understand, just no pen, and a whole lot cheaper.Now for those of you who want it for the pen...There's some pretty good apps out there for drawing and taking notes.  I'll list some of my favorites I've found so far:*Autodesk Sketchbook Pro- (Paid) I just got this app and have been experimenting with drawing in it.  The canvas sizes are preset and each have a certain amount of layers for each one.  The smallest canvas (which is still pretty big) has 18 layers, which is more than I think I will ever need.  It comes with a variety of different brushes.  I'm still exploring the brushes and figuring out everything.  People have made very beautiful art with this app, and I hope that one day I can too.  I'm pretty sure it was $4.99, you can try out the free version first to see if you like it though.*LayerPaint - (Paid) This is a pretty good app.  You can pick the size of your canvas.  It has an option to "smooth" your lines which is nice. It has as many layers as it can handle.  I haven't tested it, but I'm sure that's a lot.*Write  - (Free) This is a great app for taking notes. It has different paper options, like lined, grid, and others.  It uses vectors so it is clear no matter how far you scroll in or out.  The back option is really neat because you can hold your pen down on it and then a wheel will pop up and you can rotate your pen around it to go forwards or back, which is really helpful when trying to erase a word or two.  It also has an insert option that lets you make room for a word and will actually push the words down the lines.  It's really neat and I'm not sure if I explained it that well.  You can export your notes to PDF.  You can change your pen color and size and it has highlighter options as well. The only down side is that you cannot import images to your notes.* I can add more apps if anybody likes, I just got tired of typing descriptions out, but if people want to read them I'll write them.If anybody has any questions feel free to ask and I will try my best to answer!

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: meesuka
Reviews.Content: This is my Favorite Tab so I'm going to be a little bias but i did buy it and its was new awesome cam with everything, and awesomely ship.

Reviews.Title: Awesome

Reviews.Content: This is my Favorite Tab so I'm going to be a little bias but i did buy it and its was new awesome cam with everything, and awesomely ship.

Reviews.Title: Amazing

Reviews.Content: My first tablet, and I'm very happy that I didn't skimp on a lower model. This thing is simply fantastic and amazing.I'm still learning about all the special features that this has, but I've been completely satifsied with it thus far.Two words: multiple windows.

Reviews.Title: Great product

Reviews.Content: Super fast.  Nice touch screen response and control.  Battery life is very good.  Has a 5 GHz radio so it can connect to your dual band router.

Reviews.Content: I'm able to download an adobe on my tablet in order to do my homework from school. I love working on it for anything without having to turn on my desktop. It's very convenient!!

Reviews.Title: Very nice tablet!!

I have no idea where they are coming from and there's no way I can find to uninstall whatever is responsible for these adds.  So annoying.  Other than that this tablet is amazing.

Reviews.Title: In few works ! so far the best

Reviews.Content: You don;'t need to read big reviews  to know that this tablet is better than apple !but can be better !

Reviews.Content: Typed this up on my note...i did heavy duty research before purchasing. This definetely is an ipad smoker. As far as the difference between this and the galaxy, i would only spring for the stylus model if you are using it as a serious business tool or work in a creative field.Pros-total freedom,no islave here. Rarely bogs or crashes. Battery life excellent. Stylus integration is great,just not enough good apps out yet for it. Camera is excellent however.Cons-price point, wish it had a kensington port so i could leave it unattended.I liked this from the start, but that has grown into obsession. Reviews.Title: becoming addicted
Reviews.Author: Carl Gazzola "Carl G"

While I do use it mainly to surf and email, I also use the other functions it has yhat the ipad does not. I love the extra dimension the spen brings to the functionality to the note. Android is not restrictive like ios of apple,  in a world without much freedom  the last  thing i want to have is a restricted device , i am not exactly a apple's zombie of the their good products , but in few time i think apple going to show a ipad with some kind of pen , because samsung is the winner here by now

Reviews.Content: I like this tablet. It is fast and lightweight.  The screen is good and so is the battery life.  The S Pen is very handy and the camera works well.  It does take a long time to charge up to 100% and gets warm but not so much as to make it uncomfortable.

Reviews.Title: Great, but two (major) drawbacks
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "monadh"
Reviews.Content: I really love my Galaxy Note, especially the S Pen function for taking notes is cool. I also use it to read at lot on the train, both pdfs for school and books on Kindle and I'm quite satisfied with the resolution, though the screen reflects quite a lot in strong sunlight. For me the two major drawbacks are that it takes very long to recharge the battery, about the same time as getting them empty, and while charging, you cannot use it. Or if you try to use it, it doesn't charge properly. The second drawback for me is (as I only have the Wifi model, so I can only access the internet via the hotspot on my mobile) that there is no USB port for quick download/upload of data for when I do not have a fast internet connection. When I first unwrapped it I could not believe it didn't have a USB port. You can buy an additional adapter but even so sometimes it would not recognize the device when I connected a USB stick. I don't want to be nit-picky, but for me these two drawbacks really detract from the otherwise great usability of the Galaxy Note

Reviews.Title: Samsung should be careful what it wishes for when focusing on the pen feature
Reviews.Author: Renaissance Man
Reviews.Content: There are a million specs with tablets these days, but I got this tablet because Samsung made it sound like the pen would be the "killer app" feature.  You can use it to write wherever you can use the keyboard, but it's very inaccurate and erases your text as you go making it impossible to see the full word you type.  The note application has special features like shapes and formulas, but all are just for appearance.  The formulas don't work and the shapes don't have any particular dimension.  I hoped I might be able to type formulas direct into the spreadsheet app, but you have to constantly click the formula bar, type, and click it again.  The integration with the pen in most apps is poor at best.  The only benefit to this device per the pen might be the pressure sensitivity, but that hardly seems worth building a tablet around.  The pen also feels cheap.  This idea has potential, but this attempt is amateur hour.

Reviews.Title: Overall good, but Bluetooth is worthless
Reviews.Author: Paul R Rindfleisch
Reviews.Content: I have had this tablet for over a year now, and overall, I have been pretty pleased with it.  However, I got a Bose Soundlink bluetooth speaker for Xmas, and realized that the bluetooth functionality on this thing is pretty much worthless.  Eventually, I will get it to work, but not after 20 minutes of trying and re-trying.  I am grateful that is only on small aspect that I use it for, otherwise I would be very unhappy.  It isn't the speaker either, it works with everything else, just not the tablet.  Also, this thing has slowed down dramatically over the course of a year, to the point where it is frustratingly slow at times.  Also, Otterbox does not make a case for this thing, which pretty much precludes it from being used outdoors other than on your back patio.  If you are looking for a tablet, consider other options carefully.

Reviews.Title: A decent product but could be better
Reviews.Author: Steve Hanchett
Reviews.Content: I bought this to use for work and travel.  What I like: The note feature is helpful in my work.  I can import a picture on to a note and then write notes and information on the picture and send it to a customer as a pdf file.  It is handy for travel.  My laptop becomes cumbersome and heavy on long trips through airports and I like the fact that I don't have to get it out through security checks.It starts up quickly from the sleep mode.  Fairly good apps.The screen shot feature is simple to use and has been very helpful in saving info from the web and sharing it with others.What I don't like: The word processor app that came with it is horrible.  Slow, locks up and doesn't do much.  I found another app that works better for me.  For a while it would freeze up a lot while using the note app.  Not only would it freeze up it would lose what I was working on.  Not sure what changed, maybe it was an update from Samsung, but it seems to be working better now.One of my biggest pet peeves is you can't print from this unless you print to a Samsung printer.  It is frustrating.Would I buy this again?  Probably.  I think it is a little over priced, but has some features that I couldn't find on another tablet.

Reviews.Content: So far so great also my iPad 3, was disappointed with it songs got the Samsung, very very happy!Todd

Reviews.Title: Several of the app's I use does not have android apps.
Reviews.Author: retiredmama
Reviews.Content: I have a need to excess at least 3 different app's daily and neither are set up for android use. I contacted those companies to make sure. One of them worked part of the time. Also,one of them has the android option for mobile use, only. So,I find myself using my lap top more than I had hoped.The clarity & colors are excellent, love the e-mail option, a lot of app's to choose from, the S pen & pad. I'm still learnig all that it has to offer.How can I get a manual or instruction book? It is a lot of things I have to find by guessing.

Reviews.Title: What a great idea this was.
Reviews.Author: captG
Reviews.Content: Once I got hooked on internet it was impossible to get me out of the house cause I couldn't take my PC with me. Now I can. got a keyboard cover for it and voila!

Reviews.Title: Girlfriend Loves it
Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: She loves everything about this, except for the fact that she has to use the power supply that came with it. It will not work with any other Samsung power supply.

Reviews.Title: Happy Samsung Customer
Reviews.Author: Brigetta Bailey
Reviews.Content: I love my refurbished Samsung Galaxy Note. I would rate it a perfect 5 if I could install flash point or player. Sure I will upgrade as I like my device.

Reviews.Title: S note and S pen
Reviews.Author: Enicasio Martinez
Reviews.Content: I bought this to take notes at college and I love it. I do wish it had more accessories for women.

Reviews.Title: Galaxy Note 10.1
Reviews.Author: Sanford J. Butler
Reviews.Content: I'm still learning to use it effectively.  For anything REALLY important, I still use my laptop--screen size, keyboard size and familiarity being the major reasons for that choice.

Reviews.Title: Laptop Guy
Reviews.Author: Robert B. Mylum
Reviews.Content: I am really trying to like this tablet but so far I don't  I realize I am not accustomed to the androidmarket or the jelly bean o/s being a pc user since the mid 80's.  If I had it to do over I would buyGalaxy 3 8" wi-fi model as i find the 10.1 to be either to big or not big enough and the note featurejust gets in my way.  I bought this with the idea to use it as a true note tablet for meetings etc.But as of now I will continue to use my lap top and a legal pad both of which work flawlessly.

Reviews.Title: What it has works great!
Reviews.Author: Daisy "Life is Good"
Reviews.Content: I'm sure there is a learning curve on my part. For one thing, I didn't even think to ask if it had adobe flash, just assumed it would, doesn't everything now a days? No, it does not.Since my main purpose was for emails, fb, internet searches, & there are often videos to watch, I am really bummed I didn't realize no flash player! But, that is my fault for not knowing, but a dumb move on adobe's part. Also, have adapter to transfer pics to tablet, but haven't gotten that to work yet. When I went looking for help, the steps I am to take, menu I am suppose to see, is not there, so again, could be me. Battery seems to last pretty long. I do like it, but think maybe I should've considered 7" tablet instead. One thing I wanted it for was using a bible app on it for church & to take notes, as I've been using my phone & that is too small. That & using it as a kindle among other things. I haven't used it at church yet, because it seems so big, compared to having my phone & I don't know that I needed that big. However, I also need to present pictures on it and the 7" might have been too small for that. All in all I like it and will probably use more as I become use to it. I was not aware my apps on my phone would show up on my tablet & didn't necessarily want all of them on my tablet & vice versa. Haven't found a delete key on screen keyboard so typing anything is a pain as you have to position cursor to back/erase, just like on a phone.

Reviews.Title: Very easy to use!  Love it!
Reviews.Author: rebecca a estey
Reviews.Content: I have been an apple user for a long time.  The Galaxy note is as easy to use as an apple!

Reviews.Title: Poor Inspection process and Bypassing Customer Service responsbility
Reviews.Author: Mohammed A Jalil
Reviews.Content: The shipment received on time. This is  the only good thing about it.  The Package did not have instructions for four loose components shipped (part of adopter or battery charger and some thing else). Immediately notified Amazon. Amazon responded promptly to contact Samsung Website. If I bought the product from Amazon, why do I have to contact the maufacturer's Website. The Website did have the assembled adopter/battery charger. The representative did not have a clue for four components or how to assemble it. If Amazon is selling a product, I expect Amazon customer service to provide the required service. Don't direct it to the product manufacturer to solve the problem. Perform a quality inspection of the product you are selling to ensure it is complete and demand from the manufacturer missing items. I was able assemble the adopter /battery charger. I have to resolve the miniature clamp and needles where  they go. All Amazon had to do was to provide a copy of components name and what it does. Amazon neglected to provide a sketch/installation instruction  and component name; neglected to check if the website provides adequate information before referring. It is easy to conceive drone system for transporting package. First solve the logistic to navigate safely?

Reviews.Title: Solid performer
Reviews.Author: Ken Kaye
Reviews.Content: My wife received this as a gift.  She is quite knowledgeable, so for her to be impressed, it must be a good value.

Reviews.Title: The Wife Loves Her Note 10.1
Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: The title says it all! The Wife Loves Her Samsung Galaxy Note 10.1!Glad I bought it. If you need to see reviews look em up on YouTube

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet

Reviews.Content: This tab is AMAZING! I absolutely love it, it's everything I expected, the weight, size, the capacity. It's just amazing. Surprised how long the battery last, as much as I use it.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Note 10.1 (32GB, Deep Grey)

Reviews.Content: Samsung Galaxy Note 10.1 (32GB, Deep Grey)This product is very nice, is more than I expected. The image is great, the size perfect.

Reviews.Title: How did I do without this?!

Reviews.Content: It's my first tablet and am SO happy with it. I'm still figuring out all the things it can do, but even for basic web surfing, email, reading news, maps, and the few apps I have already, it is the best. Great battery life, and the stylus gives good options too. Camera very good (more pixels than the tab 2), and wireless connection excellent.  Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: Fabulous Tablet
Reviews.Author: Jeanne Bailey
Reviews.Content: Am still gettin to know it.  could use better tech assistance from Samsung.  Some apps don't function properly on this devise, such as facebook. other than that, it is great.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Note 10.1 (16GB, White)

Reviews.Content: Yes we like it so far but just have not had the time to really dig into the tablet and figure it out and all the features that it has to offer.I am sure that it will do everything that we want to do with it.It was in perfect condition when we received it and seems to work well

Reviews.Title: Best Tablet on the market
Reviews.Author: Kenneth R. Stephens
Reviews.Content: I love it!  I have people that have ipad, what to buy Samsung Tablet.  I love my Samsung Tablet Note 2.1

Reviews.Title: sealed package?
Reviews.Author: Bobbie
Reviews.Content: Package arrived on time. Outer box (with Amazon lable) was sealed very well, but the box containing the tablet had both seals broken.  The tablet works fine and no visable damage. Still learning how it works. And having fun playing with it.  Will know more few months down the road.

Reviews.Title: Product 4 stars, shipping ?????
Reviews.Author: kh
Reviews.Content: The first shipment consisted of the correct item box, not factory sealed, with an unidentifiable, broken tablet inside the box. No company name on the tablet. Definitely not Samsung for USA. The outer delivery box was correctly sealed. Amazon issued a return shipping label, but I had to go to the trouble of repackaging and sending it back from a UPS store.The replacement arrived a week later, was the correct item and is great for email, movies and other apps. Still need to work on my pen skills. The touch works well. So far, so good.Amazon has been silent about the original order received, no follow up except to say they received the return package in the needed time frame. No sorry about your trouble, explaination, or some sort of sweetener to take the bad experience away.

Reviews.Title: awesome

Reviews.Title: Its just i wanted

Reviews.Title: updates not in the cards
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer

That is my opinion at least and I think that to keep up on updates would probably interfere with their profit margins. As a result I would not reccomend Samsung products nor will I be purchasing any in the future.

Reviews.Title: would like more smooth and good resolution
Reviews.Author: Srikanth
Reviews.Content: I like spen functionality ... and would like more smooth and good resolution. I have ipad too .. ipad2 is much more smoother to navigate

Reviews.Title: Worst investment I made
Reviews.Author: Jeremy Logeot
Reviews.Content: I was really excited about the Samsung Galaxy Note.  Having switched over from Apple iPhone to Samsung Galaxy S3, I couldn't imagine how the tablet would turn out.Well I was wrong.  At first, I was extremely satisfied.  It comes with a pen, and it works pretty well.  A month in, it keeps crashing.  I would get error messages almost everytime I would be using an app.  I looked up how I could fix that.  And when I thought I had fixed it, a few days later, it was back to square one.  It's one thing to crash, and another thing to crash ALL THE TIME and preventing you from using other apps and having a good experience.Save your money.  Stick to the phones.  Much better.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Norman
Reviews.Content: I must say I am pretty impressed with this product.  The few things I do not like are not directly related to the Galaxy Note.  The only thing for sure I wish Samsung had addressed was printing.  It will only print to a Samsung printer.  There are some apps to help in this area.  Another disappointment is with a cover or case.  I love Otterbox, but I am very disappointed that they do not make a cover for this.  They make it for the 10.1 Tablet, but not the NOTE Tablet.  The Note is thicker than the tab.

Reviews.Title: very very good
Reviews.Author: miguel
Reviews.Content: what is offered by the seller in the photo that's like porq is for me is very good quality and I like to practice and recommend it 100% very good indeed

Reviews.Title: TabletSamgsung

Reviews.Content: For now I'm very happy with my tablet. Even I do not control the touch pen or keyboard. should include instruction videos or a Spanish site with more informationregards

Reviews.Title: Bad charger, Bad Quick Commands... Elsewise, nice.
Reviews.Author: Stephen Sunderlin
Reviews.Content: The tablet itself is amazing. It came fully packaged, sparkling with perfection... The writing on it is soooo life like and you can easily connect it's writing with my own paper hand writing. I love the cameras on both sides, it's got a great system for connecting to the internet and for switching apps around...Unfortunately, there are two things that I was displeased with. The first, lesser of the two was the "quick commands". This tablet is difficult to work commands on with the S Pen, nine times out of ten it will not recognize the command symbol.The other, major qualm is the the AC adaptability of the charger broke within the week. The company refused to replace it, so I had to scour the internet for a replacement which is not easy. Samsung devices each seem to require their own charger and none of them seem interchangeable at all.

Reviews.Title: From one artist to any others out there, do not buy this product.
Reviews.Author: Philly Purchaser
Reviews.Content: I was torn between this and the Microsoft Surface Pro. I wanted it for art -- I draw as a hobby, but haven't for years -- and the description of the S-Pen's sensitivity really made it sound like a perfect match.I'm afraid though that the pen sensitivity is nothing to write home about. I found that I had to exert a lot of pressure in order to get lines to show up consistently -- they kept cutting out, forcing me to scribble in order to get anything out of it, and after about an hour of work on it my hand was so cramped up that I had to take a lengthy break. In addition to this just being plain uncomfortable, it also made me really worry about damaging the screen.I was worried about this right away, but I decided to give it more time. However, after going to a Best Buy and trying out the Surface Pro, I knew there was seriously just no comparison at all.After another session and more pain and not much to show for it, I decided to return this product, and I would caution any artist considering the purchase. Even the Photoshop Touch app, supposedly calibrated specially to work with the Wacom pen that comes with this product (and a WACOM PEN! it all seemed so prestigious!) is flaky and disappointing.Stay away.

Reviews.Title: shirmay

Reviews.Content: Great camera for video and still shooting. I am exploring a workaround to enable the device to use Adobe flash. There is no obvious way to view Amazon Prime videos or to view many Internet sites that use flash. Any suggestions will be appreciated.I purchased it from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Un gran producto

Reviews.Author: gozorrogo "CML"
Reviews.Content: It's everything I ever hoped it would be. I recommend it to anyone who's shopping for a digital tablet notebook.

Reviews.Title: scrolling frozen
Reviews.Author: hill
Reviews.Content: I need help, I just got this on the 26th of march. started playing with it to lean how to use it.Wanted to see if it could read a book to you so went to settings and another part of the tablet to temporary enable the talking part of it (the one used for the blind or low vision) impaired. so clicked on the buttons i need to do that,went to a book and the female started reading the book (really badly, no feelings just synthetic) anyway did not like that so tried to scroll back to settings to disable it and put everything back like it was.. my tablet will not scroll so can't use it. I can't not shut this woman up, can't get anywhere. Please advise me. I don't want to send it back unless I have to.. but does not function  right now..  If i could get this working like it is suppose to I would give it a 5 star!!UPDATE: APRIL 3,2013I called samsung customer service for help.(Dave) was very help full and was able to help me get the scrolling to work. there are some glitches with "talk" and can not read books, they are working on it.. I now have my tablet back to normal and will continue to have fun learning how to use it.

Probably Google will come up with an app to do this and at the same time track what you watch.

Reviews.Content: I really thought the pen input was going to allow me to use this thing more creatively. But the apps just are not there. It is a nice tablet sure, but for this price? NOT! I gave it to my college son and now he is thinking of selling it and getting something else. I should have returned this when it was new. I went out and got myself a Samsung Chromebook as my laptop extension. I LOVE my Chromebook. Writing this review on it.

Reviews.Content: Sweet deals on your site!Not one finger print on it, works fantastically!Five star site, on time and advertisement 100% truthful.Thank you so much!

Trying to figure out use of the S pen..not easy though. Within a couple months I hope to be very satisfied with my note 10.1 purchased from Amazon. Will update later, hopefully..

Reviews.Title: Note 2 and Note 10.1 are basically the same thing.
Reviews.Author: rayna
Reviews.Content: I'm really not sure why I bought this. I have the note 2 phone and this is essentially just a bigger version of that without the ability to make phone calls. I returned it once I realized it was pretty much the same as my phone and I like my phone more.

Reviews.Title: Power Connector: Somebody's Gotta Be Kidding!
Reviews.Author: PeteCress
Reviews.Content: Ok, the physical connector is propietary. That's visually obvious to any buyer.But it turns out that the voltages are also proprietary - so forget about using your other device's wall wart.. forget about using that 12V USB adapter you already have in the car... In fact, forget about a number of common-sense conveniences.Also forget about using the device while trying to charge it.  Even with the suplied charger, it just doesn't have the juice.I find this really egregious, not to mention an ongoing PITA and an astonishingly-bad design - and it still bugs me after almost a year of ownership.Yeah, the stylus is nice... multi-windows are nice...But save yourself the heartache and a hundred bucks: get a Nexus.

If your a student or need it for business you will love this this Tab.For the casual user for Movies ETC you can get stuff much cheaper and HD screens.The feel and look is typical Samsung the make their products look and feel top notch.Beware Samsung is not the best at updating there software. They take their time so get used to waiting a while, you will get it just after every one else. Over all you can never go wrong with  Say

They haven't fixed the problem and make itdifficult to get the unit replaced. You have tosend it in to get it fixed. It takes approximately 2to 4 Weeks to get your tablet back.Very disappointed in the product. I should have choose the IPAD!! If there is a problem with any thing they send one out  UPS no questions! !

Reviews.Title: For those who wants to use this device to read

Reviews.Content: I suggest not to buy this device, because the screen resolution of this device is bad. As a college student, I read lots of pdf file. But if I use this device, I cannot see the character clearly. I suggest you buy amazon kindle fire HD, although there's no S-pen. Because S-pen is not that useful.I returned it after one day because of the screen resolution.

Reviews.Title: Samsung's customer service experience
Reviews.Author: charles dawson
Reviews.Content: Worst customer service I've ever experienced from a conglomerate electronics company.I ordered the Galaxy note 10.1 on 3/23/13 shipping and services from Amazon.com was  Superb!!!When I received my unit there was some issues so I opted to send it to Samsung for service, turns out the adapter was faulty and the battery inside of the galaxy note needed to be replaced. It took 2 weeks for repairs.  Upon the return  my unit was sent to the wrong address...when  It finally arrived to me,  Packaging was horrendous!! my unit was placed inside an old/used sandwich-bag placed inside an oversize bent-up-box with no filler/stuffing thus, the unit was scuffed pretty good.If that wasn't bad enough they left out the adapter... I've called Samsung over 50 times  To resolve my issues but I get no where!!! Today 4/23/13 a month later and i still haven't been able to use the unit because i still have no adapter!!!  I called again today and was told by a rep that I should look for the adapter cause maybe it's at the first address they sent it to....  wooooow really???ok at this point  The curse-words started rolling off my tongue!!! so the rep tells me, she can order me a new adapter but it will take 5 business days and if I want it faster I can buy one. I wanted to send this unit back to Amazon.com but Samsung has held up the progress because of the adapter and my 30 days  return warranty has expired with Amazon.I would have never had this problem with Apple.

Reviews.Title: Lots and lots of problems !!!!
Reviews.Author: Gaston C.
Reviews.Content: I have the old model 7510 and works excellent.This model (8000) resets randomly while is hibernated, the S-pen doesn't work properly, it couldn't upgrade OTA (Processing error appears) or thru PC (doesn't recognized by KIES) though, I can send and receive as a pendriveI hate this tablet

Reviews.Title: Nice but needs basic model offer

Reviews.Title: HOPEFULLY IT WILL MEET ALL MY DEMANDS.
